              def index
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                # Definir o ms e ano atual ou baseado nos parmetros
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                @current_date = params[:date] ? Date.parse(params[:date]) : Date.current
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                @current_month = @current_date.beginning_of_month
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                @current_year = @current_date.year
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

            
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                # Buscar eventos do ms atual

    13. 
            

            

                month_start = @current_month.beginning_of_month
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                month_end = @current_month.end_of_month
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

            
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                @calendars = Calendar.includes(:school)

                if params[:search].present?

                # Agrupar eventos por data para facilitar a exibio no calendrio

                @calendar = Calendar.new

    85.

              def create

                @calendar = Calendar.new(calendar_params)

    99. 
            

            

                if @calendar.save

              def calculate_general_attendance_rate
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                total_students = User.where(user_type: "student").count
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                return 0 if total_students.zero?
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

            
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                total_absences = Absence.where("date >= ?", 30.days.ago).count
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                return 95.0 if total_absences.zero?
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

            
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                attendance_rate = [ 100.0 - (total_absences.to_f / total_students * 10), 0 ].max
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                attendance_rate.round(1)
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

              end
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

            
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

              def calculate_attendance_summary
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                School.joins(:students)
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                      .where(users: { user_type: "student" })
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                      .group("schools.name")
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                      .average("100 - (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM absences WHERE absences.user_id = users.id AND absences.date >= '#{30.days.ago.to_date}') * 10")
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

              end
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

            end
          
      54.

              def index

              def create

                @document = Document.new(document_params)

                  @document.sharing_type = "specific_user"

      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

            
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                # Processar upload de arquivo se presente
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                if params[:document][:file].present?
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  uploaded_file = params[:document][:file]
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  @document.file_name = uploaded_file.original_filename
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

            
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  # Criar diretrio se no existir
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                  upload_dir = Rails.root.join("storage", "documents")
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  FileUtils.mkdir_p(upload_dir) unless Dir.exist?(upload_dir)
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

            
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                  # Salvar arquivo com nome nico
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                  original_filename = uploaded_file.original_filename.to_s
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                  file_extension = File.extname(original_filename).downcase
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                  # Validar extenso do arquivo
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                  allowed_extensions = %w[.pdf .doc .docx .txt .jpg .jpeg .png .gif]
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                  unless allowed_extensions.include?(file_extension)
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                    @document.errors.add(:file, "Tipo de arquivo no permitido")
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                    render :new and return
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71.

      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72.

    73. 
            

            

                  unique_filename = "#{SecureRandom.uuid}#{file_extension}"
          
      74.

              def download
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                if @document.attachment.attached?
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                  redirect_to rails_blob_path(@document.attachment, disposition: "attachment")
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                elsif @document.file_path.present? && File.exist?(@document.file_path)
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                  # Sanitizar nome do arquivo para evitar path traversal
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                  safe_filename = File.basename(@document.file_name)
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                  send_file @document.file_path, filename: safe_filename, type: "application/octet-stream"
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                else
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                  redirect_to admin_documents_path, alert: "Arquivo no encontrado."
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                end
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

              end
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

            
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

              private
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140.

              def index

                # Aplicar filtros
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                sent_messages = current_user.sent_messages

    8. 
            

            

                received_messages = current_user.received_messages
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

            
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                # Filtro por status
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                if params[:status].present?
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  case params[:status]
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  when "unread"
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                    sent_messages = sent_messages.where(read: false)
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                    received_messages = received_messages.unread
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16.

      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                    sent_messages = sent_messages.where(read: true)
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18.

      19.

      20.

                # Filtro por tipo

                if params[:type].present?
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  case params[:type]
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  when "received"
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                    sent_messages = sent_messages.none

                # Filtro de busca

                if params[:search].present?
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                  search_term = "%#{params[:search]}%"
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  sent_messages = sent_messages.joins(:recipient)

    37.

    39.

      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

            
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                @sent_messages = sent_messages.includes(:recipient, :school).order(created_at: :desc).limit(50)
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44.

              def new

    49.

              def create
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                @message = current_user.sent_messages.build(message_params)

    56. 
            

            

            
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57.

    58.

      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                else
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                  # Para admin, definir school com base no recipient
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  if @message.recipient_id.present?
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62.

      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                    @message.school = recipient.school if recipient.school.present?
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64.

      65.

    68. 
            

            

            
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69.

      70.

      73.

              def message_params
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94.

              def handle_broadcast_message
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                success_count = 0
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                error_count = 0
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

            
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                recipients = get_broadcast_recipients
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

            
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                recipients.each do |recipient|
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                  message = current_user.sent_messages.build(
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                    subject: params[:message][:subject],
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                    body: params[:message][:body],
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                    recipient: recipient,
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                    school: recipient.school || School.first
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                  )
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

            
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                  if message.save
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                    success_count += 1
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                  else
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                    error_count += 1
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                  end
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                end
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

            
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                if error_count == 0
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                  redirect_to admin_messages_path,
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                              notice: "Comunicado enviado com sucesso para #{success_count} destinatrios."
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                else
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                  redirect_to admin_messages_path,
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                              alert: "#{success_count} mensagens enviadas, #{error_count} falharam."
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                end
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

              end
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

            
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

              def get_broadcast_recipients
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                case params[:broadcast_type]
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                when "all_schools"
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                  User.directions
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                when "all_directors"
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                  User.directions
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                when "school"
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                  school = School.find(params[:school_id])
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                  school.users.where.not(id: current_user.id)
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                when "all_teachers"
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                  User.teachers
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                when "all_students"
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                  User.students
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                else
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                  User.none
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                end
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

              end
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

            end

              def municipal_overview

              def attendance_report
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                @schools = School.includes(:users)
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

            
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                # Calcular taxa de presena por escola (implementao bsica)
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                @attendance_by_school = @schools.map do |school|
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                  total_students = school.users.student.count
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  total_absences = Absence.joins(:user).where(users: { school_id: school.id }).count
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

            
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  # Assumindo 200 dias letivos por ano
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  expected_presences = total_students * 200
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  actual_presences = expected_presences - total_absences
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  attendance_rate = expected_presences > 0 ? (actual_presences.to_f / expected_presences * 100).round(2) : 0
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

            
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  {
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                    school: school,
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                    students: total_students,
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                    attendance_rate: attendance_rate,
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                    absences: total_absences
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                  }
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                end
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

              end
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

            
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

              def performance_report
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                @schools = School.includes(:users)

              def backup_system
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                begin
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                  backup_filename = "backup_#{Time.current.strftime('%Y%m%d_%H%M%S')}"
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                  backup_path = Rails.root.join("tmp", "backups")
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

            
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                  # Criar diretrio de backup se no existir
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                  FileUtils.mkdir_p(backup_path)
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

            
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                  # Backup do banco de dados
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                  if perform_database_backup(backup_path, backup_filename)
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                    # Backup dos arquivos
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                    perform_files_backup(backup_path, backup_filename)
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

            
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                    redirect_to admin_settings_path, notice: "Backup realizado com sucesso: #{backup_filename}"
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                  else
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                    redirect_to admin_settings_path, alert: "Erro ao realizar backup do banco de dados."
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                  end
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                  redirect_to admin_settings_path, alert: "Erro ao realizar backup: #{e.message}"
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                end
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

              end
          
      85.

              def system_info

    92. 
            

            

                  total_users: User.count,
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                  total_schools: School.count,
          
      94.

                }

              def user_params

              def generate_secure_password
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                # Gerar senha segura com letras, nmeros e smbolos
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                chars = ("a".."z").to_a + ("A".."Z").to_a + (0..9).to_a + [ "!", "@", "#", "$", "%" ]
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                (0...12).map { chars.sample }.join
          
      117.

              def get_calendar_settings

              def perform_database_backup(backup_path, backup_filename)
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                case ActiveRecord::Base.connection_db_config.adapter
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                when "sqlite3"
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                  database_path = ActiveRecord::Base.connection_db_config.database
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                  backup_file = backup_path.join("#{backup_filename}.sqlite3")
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                  FileUtils.cp(database_path, backup_file)
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                  true
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                when "postgresql"
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                  # Implementar backup PostgreSQL
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                  database_name = ActiveRecord::Base.connection_db_config.database
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                  system("pg_dump", database_name, out: "#{backup_path}/#{backup_filename}.sql")
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                when "mysql2"
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                  # Implementar backup MySQL
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                  database_name = ActiveRecord::Base.connection_db_config.database
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                  system("mysqldump", database_name, out: "#{backup_path}/#{backup_filename}.sql")
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                else
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                  false
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                end
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

              rescue
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                false
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

              end
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

            
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

              def perform_files_backup(backup_path, backup_filename)
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                # Backup dos arquivos importantes (uploads, storage, etc.)
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                storage_path = Rails.root.join("storage")
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                backup_storage = backup_path.join("#{backup_filename}_storage.tar.gz")
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

            
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                system("tar", "-czf", backup_storage.to_s, "-C", Rails.root.to_s, "storage") if Dir.exist?(storage_path)
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

              end
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

            
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

              def calculate_disk_usage
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                begin
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                  size = `du -sh #{Rails.root}`.split.first
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                  size || "N/A"
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                rescue
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                  "N/A"
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                end
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

              end
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

            
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

              def calculate_database_size
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                begin
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                  case ActiveRecord::Base.connection_db_config.adapter
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                  when "sqlite3"
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                    database_path = ActiveRecord::Base.connection_db_config.database
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                    size_bytes = File.size(database_path)
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                    format_file_size(size_bytes)
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                  else
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                    "N/A"
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                  end
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                rescue
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                  "N/A"
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                end
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

              end
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

            
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

              def format_file_size(size_bytes)
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                units = %w[B KB MB GB TB]
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                size = size_bytes.to_f
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                unit_index = 0
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

            
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                while size >= 1024 && unit_index < units.length - 1
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                  size /= 1024.0
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                  unit_index += 1
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                end
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

            
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                "#{size.round(2)} #{units[unit_index]}"
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

              end
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

            
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

              def get_last_backup_date
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                backup_path = Rails.root.join("tmp", "backups")
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                return "Nunca" unless Dir.exist?(backup_path)
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

            
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                backup_files = Dir.glob(backup_path.join("*"))
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                return "Nunca" if backup_files.empty?
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

            
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                latest_backup = backup_files.max_by { |f| File.mtime(f) }
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                File.mtime(latest_backup).strftime("%d/%m/%Y %H:%M")
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

              rescue
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                "N/A"
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

              end
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

            
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

              def get_recent_backups
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                backup_path = Rails.root.join("tmp", "backups")
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                return [] unless Dir.exist?(backup_path)
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

            
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                Dir.glob(backup_path.join("*")).map do |file|
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                  {
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                    name: File.basename(file),
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                    size: format_file_size(File.size(file)),
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                    created_at: File.mtime(file)
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                  }
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                end.sort_by { |backup| backup[:created_at] }.reverse.first(10)
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

              rescue
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

                []
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

              end
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

            
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

              def get_system_uptime
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                begin
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

                  uptime_seconds = File.read("/proc/uptime").split.first.to_f
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

                  days = (uptime_seconds / 86400).to_i
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

                  hours = ((uptime_seconds % 86400) / 3600).to_i
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

                  minutes = ((uptime_seconds % 3600) / 60).to_i
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

                  "#{days}d #{hours}h #{minutes}m"
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

                rescue
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

                  "N/A"
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

                end
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

              end
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

            
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

              def get_server_info
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

                {
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

                  hostname: `hostname`.strip,
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

                  os: `uname -s`.strip,
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

                  kernel: `uname -r`.strip,
          
      246.

                  architecture: `uname -m`.strip
          
      247.

                }
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            

              rescue
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            

                { hostname: "N/A", os: "N/A", kernel: "N/A", architecture: "N/A" }
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            

              end
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            

            
          
      252.

            class Admin::UsersController < ApplicationController

              before_action :authenticate_user!

              before_action :authorize_superadmin!
          
      4.

              before_action :set_user, only: [ :show, :edit, :update, :destroy ]

              def index
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                @users = User.includes(:school).all
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                # Aplicar filtros de busca
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                if params[:search].present?
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  @users = @users.where("email ILIKE ? OR first_name ILIKE ? OR last_name ILIKE ?",
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                                       "%#{params[:search]}%", "%#{params[:search]}%", "%#{params[:search]}%")
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                end
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

            
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                if params[:user_type].present?
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  @users = @users.where(user_type: params[:user_type])
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                end
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

            
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                if params[:school_id].present?
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  @users = @users.where(school_id: params[:school_id])
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                end
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

            
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                @users = @users.order(:first_name, :last_name)
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                @schools = School.order(:name)
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

              end
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

            
          
      27.

              def show

              def new

                @user = User.new

                @schools = School.order(:name)

      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

            
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

              def create
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                @user = User.new(user_params)
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                @user.password = SecureRandom.hex(8) if @user.password.blank?
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

            
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                if @user.save
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40.

      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                else
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  @schools = School.order(:name)
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  render :new
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44.

                @schools = School.order(:name)

              end
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

            
          
      51.

              def update

                if @user.update(user_params_for_update)

              def user_params

              def user_params_for_update

                permitted_params = user_params

            class CalendarsController < ApplicationController
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              before_action :authenticate_user!
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

            
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              def index
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                # Definir o ms e ano atual ou baseado nos parmetros
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                @current_date = params[:date] ? Date.parse(params[:date]) : Date.current
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                @current_month = @current_date.beginning_of_month
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                @current_year = @current_date.year
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

            
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                # Buscar eventos do ms atual baseado no tipo de usurio
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                month_start = @current_month.beginning_of_month
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                month_end = @current_month.end_of_month
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

            
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                @calendars = build_calendar_query(month_start, month_end)
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

            
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                # Aplicar filtros
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                if params[:search].present?
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                  @calendars = @calendars.where("title ILIKE ? OR description ILIKE ?",
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                                              "%#{params[:search]}%", "%#{params[:search]}%")
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                end
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

            
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                if params[:calendar_type].present?
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  @calendars = @calendars.where(calendar_type: params[:calendar_type])
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                end
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

            
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                @calendars = @calendars.order(:date)
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

            
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                # Buscar eventos municipais do ms
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29.

      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                # Aplicar filtros aos eventos
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                if params[:search].present?
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  @events = @events.where("title ILIKE ? OR description ILIKE ?",
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                                         "%#{params[:search]}%", "%#{params[:search]}%")
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                end
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

            
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                # Agrupar eventos por data para facilitar a exibio no calendrio
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                @events_by_date = @calendars.group_by(&:date)
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                @municipal_events_by_date = @events.group_by { |e| e.start_date || e.event_date }
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

            
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                # Dados para os filtros
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                @calendar_types = Calendar::CALENDAR_TYPES
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

            
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                # Calcular navegao do calendrio
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                @prev_month = @current_month - 1.month
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                @next_month = @current_month + 1.month
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

            
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                # Estatsticas do ms
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                @month_stats = {
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                  total_events: @calendars.count + @events.count,
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  holidays: @calendars.where(calendar_type: [ "holiday", "municipal_holiday" ]).count,
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  vacations: @calendars.where(calendar_type: "vacation").count,
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  school_events: @calendars.where(calendar_type: [ "school_start", "school_end" ]).count + @events.count
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                }
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

              end
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

            
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

              private
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

            
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

              def build_calendar_query(month_start, month_end)
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                calendars = Calendar.includes(:school).where(date: month_start..month_end)
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

            
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                case current_user.user_type
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                when "admin"
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                  # Admin pode ver todos os calendrios
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                  calendars
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                when "direction"
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                  # Diretor pode ver eventos municipais e da sua escola
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                  if current_user.school_id.present?
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                    calendars.where(
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                      "(all_schools = ? OR school_id = ?)",
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                      true, current_user.school_id
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                    )
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                  else
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                    # Diretor sem escola v apenas eventos municipais
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                    calendars.where(all_schools: true)
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                  end
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                when "teacher", "student"
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                  # Professor e estudante podem ver eventos municipais e da sua escola
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                  if current_user.school_id.present?
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                    calendars.where(
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                      "(all_schools = ? OR school_id = ?)",
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                      true, current_user.school_id
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                    )
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                  else
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                    # Usurio sem escola v apenas eventos municipais
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                    calendars.where(all_schools: true)
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                  end
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88.

                  calendars.none

              end
          
      92.

      93.

              def build_events_query(month_start, month_end)
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                events = Event.includes(:school).where(
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                  "COALESCE(start_date, event_date) >= ? AND COALESCE(start_date, event_date) <= ?",
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                  month_start, month_end
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                )
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

            
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                case current_user.user_type
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                when "admin"
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                  # Admin pode ver todos os eventos
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                  events
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                when "direction"
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                  # Diretor pode ver eventos municipais e da sua escola
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                  if current_user.school_id.present?
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                    events.where(
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                      "(is_municipal = ? OR school_id = ?)",
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                      true, current_user.school_id
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                    )
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                  else
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                    # Diretor sem escola v apenas eventos municipais
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                    events.where(is_municipal: true)
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                  end
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                when "teacher", "student"
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                  # Professor e estudante podem ver eventos municipais e da sua escola
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                  if current_user.school_id.present?
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                    events.where(
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                      "(is_municipal = ? OR school_id = ?)",
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                      true, current_user.school_id
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                    )
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                  else
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                    # Usurio sem escola v apenas eventos municipais
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                    events.where(is_municipal: true)
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                  end
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                else
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                  events.none
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                end
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

              end

              def index
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                # Definir o ms e ano atual ou baseado nos parmetros
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                @current_date = params[:date] ? Date.parse(params[:date]) : Date.current
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                @current_month = @current_date.beginning_of_month
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                @current_year = @current_date.year
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

            
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                # Buscar eventos do ms atual baseado no tipo de usurio
          
      12.

      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                month_end = @current_month.end_of_month
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

            
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15.

    16. 
            

            

            
          
      17.

                if params[:search].present?
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19.

      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                                              "%#{params[:search]}%", "%#{params[:search]}%")
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                end
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22.

      24.

    25.

      26.

      37.

                # Agrupar eventos por data para facilitar a exibio no calendrio

    39. 
            

            

                @events_by_date = @calendars.group_by(&:date)
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                @municipal_events_by_date = @events.group_by { |e| e.start_date || e.event_date }
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

            
          
      42.

                # Dados para os filtros

                @calendar_types = Calendar::CALENDAR_TYPES

    44. 
            

            

            
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                # Calcular navegao do calendrio
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                @prev_month = @current_month - 1.month
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                @next_month = @current_month + 1.month
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

            
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                # Estatsticas do ms

                @month_stats = {

      56.

              end

              def build_calendar_query(month_start, month_end)
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                calendars = Calendar.includes(:school).where(date: month_start..month_end)

    62. 
            

            

            
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                if current_user.school_id.present?
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64.

      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                    true, current_user.school_id
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                  )
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                else
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                  # Diretor sem escola v apenas eventos municipais
          
      70.

                  calendars.where(all_schools: true)
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                end
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

              end
          
      73.
