            class Direction::ClassSchedulesController < ApplicationController
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              before_action :authenticate_user!
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              before_action :ensure_direction!
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

            
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              def index
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                @school = current_user.school
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                @classrooms = Classroom.where(school: @school).includes(:class_schedules, :subjects)
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                # Filtros
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                if params[:classroom_id].present?
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  @selected_classroom = Classroom.find(params[:classroom_id])
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  @class_schedules = @selected_classroom.class_schedules
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                                                       .includes(:subject, :classroom)
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                                                       .order(:weekday, :start_time)
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                else
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  @class_schedules = ClassSchedule.joins(:classroom)
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                                                 .where(classrooms: { school: @school })
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                                                 .includes(:subject, :classroom)
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                                                 .order(:weekday, :start_time)
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                end
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

            
          
      22.

                if params[:weekday].present?

    24. 
            

            

                end
          
      25.

                @days_of_week = [

                  [ "Segunda-feira", 1 ],

              def show
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                @classroom = Classroom.find(params[:id])
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

            
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                # Verificar se a turma pertence  escola do diretor
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                unless @classroom.school == current_user.school
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  redirect_to direction_class_schedules_path, alert: "Turma no encontrada."
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  return
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                end
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

            
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                @class_schedules = @classroom.class_schedules
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                                            .includes(:subject)
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                                            .order(:weekday, :start_time)
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

            
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                @schedule_grid = build_schedule_grid(@class_schedules)
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

              end
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

            
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

              def new
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                @class_schedule = ClassSchedule.new
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                @classrooms = Classroom.where(school: current_user.school)
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                @subjects = Subject.where(school: current_user.school)
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

              end
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

            
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

              def create
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                @class_schedule = ClassSchedule.new(class_schedule_params)
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                @class_schedule.school = current_user.school
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

            
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "=== ClassSchedule Create Debug ==="
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Params: #{class_schedule_params}"
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "School: #{current_user.school.id}"
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Valid?: #{@class_schedule.valid?}"
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Errors: #{@class_schedule.errors.full_messages}" unless @class_schedule.valid?
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

            
          
      68.

                if @class_schedule.save
          
      69.

                  redirect_to direction_class_schedules_path, notice: "Horrio criado com sucesso."

      71.

                  @classrooms = Classroom.where(school: current_user.school)

              def class_schedule_params

              def build_schedule_grid(schedules)
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                grid = {}
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

            
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                (1..6).each do |day|
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                  grid[day] = schedules.select { |s| s.weekday == day }
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                                      .sort_by(&:start_time)
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                end
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

            
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                grid
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

              end
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

            end

            class Direction::DashboardController < ApplicationController
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              before_action :authenticate_user!
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              before_action :ensure_direction!
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

            
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              def index
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                @school = current_user.school
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                load_dashboard_data
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

              rescue => e
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "Erro no dashboard da direo: #{e.message}"
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error e.backtrace.join("\n")

    11. 
            

            

                handle_dashboard_error

              end
          
      13.

              def refresh_data

    15. 
            

            

                @school = current_user.school
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                load_dashboard_data
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

            
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                render json: {
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  total_students: @total_students,
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  total_teachers: @total_teachers,
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  total_classrooms: @total_classrooms,
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  total_subjects: @total_subjects,
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  attendance_rate: @attendance_rate,
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  average_grade: @average_grade,
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  total_messages: @total_messages,
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                  updated_at: Time.current.strftime("%d/%m/%Y s %H:%M")

    27. 
            

            

                }

    28. 
            

            

              rescue => e

                Rails.logger.error "Erro ao atualizar dados do dashboard: #{e.message}"
          
      30.

                render json: { error: "Erro ao atualizar dados" }, status: 500
          
      31.

      32.

              private
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

            
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

              def load_dashboard_data
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                # Estatsticas bsicas
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                @total_students = User.where(school_id: @school.id, user_type: "student")
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                                     .distinct.count
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                @total_teachers = User.where(school_id: @school.id, user_type: "teacher").count
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                @total_classrooms = Classroom.where(school_id: @school.id).count
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                @total_subjects = Subject.joins(:classroom).where(classrooms: { school_id: @school.id }).distinct.count
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

            
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                # Eventos prximos (prximos 7 dias)
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                @upcoming_events = Event.where(school_id: @school.id)
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                                       .where("start_date >= ? AND start_date <= ?", Date.current, 7.days.from_now)
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                                       .order(:start_date)
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                                       .limit(5)
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

            
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                # Mensagens recentes no lidas
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                @recent_messages = current_user.received_messages.unread.recent.limit(5)
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

            
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                # Avisos e notificaes importantes
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                @important_notifications = get_important_notifications
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

            
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                # Relatrios gerais
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                @attendance_rate = calculate_attendance_rate
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                @average_grade = calculate_average_grade
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                @total_messages = calculate_total_messages
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

            
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                # Alertas e avisos
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                @alerts = generate_school_alerts
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

              end
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

            
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

              def handle_dashboard_error
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                # Valores padro em caso de erro
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                @total_students = 0
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                @total_teachers = 0
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                @total_classrooms = 0
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                @total_subjects = 0
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                @upcoming_events = []
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                @important_notifications = []
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                @attendance_rate = "N/A"
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                @average_grade = "N/A"
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                @total_messages = 0
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                @alerts = []
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

            
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                flash.now[:alert] = "Erro ao carregar dados do dashboard. Alguns indicadores podem no estar atualizados."
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

              end
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

            
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

              # ... mtodos privados existentes ...
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

            
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

              def get_important_notifications
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                notifications = []
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

            
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                # Verificar eventos prximos
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                events_today = Event.where(school_id: @school.id, start_date: Date.current).count
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                if events_today > 0
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                  notifications << {
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                    type: "info",
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                    icon: "fas fa-calendar-day",
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                    title: "Eventos Hoje",
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                    message: "#{events_today} evento(s) programado(s) para hoje",
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                    link: direction_events_path
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                  }
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                end
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

            
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                # Verificar professores sem disciplinas
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                teachers_without_subjects = User.where(school_id: @school.id, user_type: "teacher")
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                                               .left_joins(:teacher_subjects)
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                                               .where(subjects: { id: nil })
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                                               .count
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                if teachers_without_subjects > 0
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                  notifications << {
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                    type: "warning",
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                    icon: "fas fa-user-times",
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                    title: "Professores sem Disciplinas",
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                    message: "#{teachers_without_subjects} professor(es) sem disciplinas atribudas",
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                    link: direction_teachers_path
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                  }
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                end
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

            
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                # Verificar turmas sem horrios completos
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                classrooms_without_full_schedule = Classroom.where(school_id: @school.id)
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                                                           .select { |c| c.class_schedules.active.count < 20 } # Menos de 20 aulas por semana
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                                                           .count
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                if classrooms_without_full_schedule > 0
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                  notifications << {
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                    type: "warning",
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                    icon: "fas fa-clock",
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                    title: "Grade de Horrios Incompleta",
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                    message: "#{classrooms_without_full_schedule} turma(s) com grade de horrios incompleta",
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                    link: direction_class_schedules_path
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                  }
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                end
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

            
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                notifications
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

              end
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

            
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

              def generate_school_alerts
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                alerts = []
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

            
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                # Taxa de frequncia baixa
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                attendance_numeric = @attendance_rate.to_f if @attendance_rate != "N/A"
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                if attendance_numeric && attendance_numeric < 75
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                  alerts << {
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                    type: "danger",
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                    title: "Taxa de Frequncia Baixa",
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                    message: "A taxa de frequncia da escola est em #{@attendance_rate}%, abaixo do recomendado (85%)"
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                  }
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                end
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

            
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                # Verificar conflitos de horrios
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                conflicting_schedules = ClassSchedule.where(school_id: @school.id, active: true)
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                                                    .group(:classroom_id, :weekday, :start_time)
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                                                    .having("COUNT(*) > 1")
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                                                    .count
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                if conflicting_schedules.any?
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                  alerts << {
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                    type: "danger",
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                    title: "Conflitos de Horrio",
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                    message: "Existem #{conflicting_schedules.size} conflito(s) na grade de horrios"
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                  }
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                end
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

            
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                # Verificar professores sem horrios atribudos (atravs das disciplinas)
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                teachers_without_classrooms = User.where(school_id: @school.id, user_type: "teacher")
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                                                 .left_joins(:teacher_subjects)
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                                                 .joins("LEFT JOIN class_schedules ON subjects.id = class_schedules.subject_id")
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                                                 .where(class_schedules: { id: nil })
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                                                 .where.not(subjects: { id: nil })
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                                                 .distinct
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                                                 .count
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                if teachers_without_classrooms > 0
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                  alerts << {
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                    type: "info",
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                    title: "Professores sem Horrios",
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                    message: "#{teachers_without_classrooms} professor(es) com disciplinas mas sem horrios definidos"
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                  }
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                end
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

            
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                alerts
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

              end
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

            
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

              private
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

            
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

              def calculate_attendance_rate
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                # Calculando taxa de frequncia baseada nas ausncias dos ltimos 30 dias
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                total_students = User.where(school_id: @school.id, user_type: "student").count
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

            
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                return "N/A" if total_students.zero?
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

            
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                # Corrigindo o join - usar :student ao invs de :user
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                total_absences = Absence.joins(:student)
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                                       .where(users: { school_id: @school.id })
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                                       .where("absences.date >= ?", 30.days.ago)
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                                       .count
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

            
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                # Se no h ausncias registradas nos ltimos 30 dias, verificar se h ausncias antigas
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                if total_absences.zero?
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                  all_absences = Absence.joins(:student).where(users: { school_id: @school.id }).count
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

            
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                  if all_absences.zero?
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                    return "N/A"  # No h dados de frequncia
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                  else
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                    # H ausncias registradas, mas no recentes - assumir boa frequncia
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                    return "95.0"
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                  end
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                end
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

            
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                # Calculamos uma estimativa mais realista
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                # Assumindo 22 dias letivos por ms (excluindo fins de semana)
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                expected_presences = total_students * 22
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                actual_presences = expected_presences - total_absences
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

            
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                # Garantir que no seja negativo e arredondar para 1 casa decimal
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                attendance_rate = [ (actual_presences.to_f / expected_presences * 100), 0.0 ].max.round(1)
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

            
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                # Se a taxa calculada for muito alta (>100%), limitar a 98%
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                [ attendance_rate, 98.0 ].min.to_s
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

              end
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

            
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

              def calculate_average_grade
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                # Corrigindo o join - usar :student ao invs de :user
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                grades = Grade.joins(:student)
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                              .where(users: { school_id: @school.id })
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                              .where("grades.created_at >= ?", 30.days.ago)
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

            
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                # Se no h notas recentes, verificar se h notas antigas
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                if grades.empty?
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                  all_grades = Grade.joins(:student).where(users: { school_id: @school.id })
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

            
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                  if all_grades.empty?
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                    return "N/A"  # No h notas cadastradas
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                  else
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                    # Usar a mdia de todas as notas se no h notas recentes
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

                    average = all_grades.average(:value) || 0
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

                    return average.round(1).to_s
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

                  end
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

                end
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

            
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

                average = grades.average(:value) || 0
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

                average.round(1).to_s
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

              end
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

            
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

              def calculate_total_messages
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

                # Contando mensagens enviadas pelos usurios da escola nos ltimos 30 dias
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

                # Verificar se a associao :sender existe no modelo Message
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

                begin
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

                  Message.joins(:sender)
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

                         .where(users: { school_id: @school.id })
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

                         .where("messages.created_at >= ?", 30.days.ago)
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

                         .count
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

                rescue ActiveRecord::StatementInvalid, ActiveRecord::AssociationNotFoundError => e
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

                  # Se houver erro na associao, contar mensagens de forma alternativa
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.warn "Erro ao calcular mensagens: #{e.message}"
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            

            
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            

                  # Tentar contagem alternativa usando sender_id
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            

                  Message.where(sender_id: User.where(school_id: @school.id).pluck(:id))
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            

                         .where("created_at >= ?", 30.days.ago)
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            

                         .count
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Erro crtico ao calcular mensagens: #{e.message}"
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            

                  0 # Retorna 0 em caso de erro
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            

                end
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            

              end
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            

            end
          
      257.

              def index
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                @school = current_user.school
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                @documents = Document.where(school: @school)
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                                    .includes(:user)
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                                    .order(created_at: :desc)
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

            
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                # Filtros

    12. 
            

            

                if params[:search].present?
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  @documents = @documents.where("title ILIKE ? OR description ILIKE ?",
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                                               "%#{params[:search]}%", "%#{params[:search]}%")
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                end
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16.

              def create
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                @document = Document.new(document_params.except(:target_user_id))

    54. 
            

            

                @document.school = current_user.school
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                @document.user = current_user
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56.

      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

            
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                # Se for anexo para usurio especfico
          
      59.

                if params[:document][:target_user_id].present?
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                  target_user = User.find(params[:document][:target_user_id])
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  if @document.can_be_attached_by?(current_user, target_user)
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                    @document.sharing_type = "specific_user"
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                    @document.recipient = target_user
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                  else
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                    @document.errors.add(:base, "Voc no tem permisso para anexar documentos para este usurio.")
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                    @teachers = current_user.school.users.where(user_type: "teacher")
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                    @students = current_user.school.users.where(user_type: "student")
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                    @classrooms = current_user.school.classrooms
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                    render :new
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                    return
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                  end

              def attach_to_user

                  redirect_to direction_documents_path, alert: "Usurio no encontrado ou no pertence  sua escola."
          
      150.

                  return
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                end
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

            
          
      153.

                @document = Document.new

              def document_params
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                params.require(:document).permit(:title, :description, :document_type, :attachment, :sharing_type, :classroom_id, :target_user_id)

    app/controllers/direction/events_controller.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    67 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 67 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            class Direction::EventsController < ApplicationController
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              before_action :authenticate_user!
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              before_action :ensure_direction!
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              before_action :set_event, only: [ :show, :edit, :update, :destroy ]
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

            
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              def index
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                @events = current_user.school.events
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                # Por padro, mostrar apenas eventos no concludos
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                # S mostra concludos se filtrado explicitamente
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                if params[:status].present?
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  case params[:status]
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  when "planned"
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                    @events = @events.where("COALESCE(start_date, event_date) > ?", Date.current)
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                  when "ongoing"
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                    @events = @events.where("COALESCE(start_date, event_date) = ?", Date.current)
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  when "completed"
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                    @events = @events.where("COALESCE(start_date, event_date) < ?", Date.current)
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  end
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                else
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  # Por padro: eventos futuros e de hoje (no mostrar concludos)
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  @events = @events.where("COALESCE(start_date, event_date) >= ?", Date.current)
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                end
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

            
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                # Aplicar outros filtros
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                if params[:search].present?
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                  @events = @events.where("title ILIKE ? OR description ILIKE ?",
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                                         "%#{params[:search]}%", "%#{params[:search]}%")
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                end
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

            
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                if params[:event_type].present?
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                  @events = @events.where(event_type: params[:event_type])
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                end
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

            
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                if params[:start_date].present?
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  @events = @events.where("COALESCE(start_date, event_date) >= ?", params[:start_date])
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                end
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

            
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                if params[:end_date].present?
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  @events = @events.where("COALESCE(start_date, event_date) <= ?", params[:end_date])
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                end
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

            
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                @events = @events.order(Arel.sql("COALESCE(start_date, event_date) ASC"))
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44.

              def create

              def event_params

            class Direction::MessagesController < ApplicationController
          
      2.

              before_action :authenticate_user!
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              before_action :ensure_direction!
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              before_action :set_message, only: [ :show ]
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

            
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              def index
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                @school = current_user.school
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                # Aplicar filtros
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                sent_messages = current_user.sent_messages.where(school: current_user.school)
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                received_messages = current_user.received_messages.where(school: current_user.school)
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

            
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                # Filtro por status
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                if params[:status].present?
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                  case params[:status]
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  when "unread"
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                    sent_messages = sent_messages.where(read: false)
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                    received_messages = received_messages.unread
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  when "read"
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                    sent_messages = sent_messages.where(read: true)
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                    received_messages = received_messages.where(read_at: nil..)
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  end
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                end
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

            
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                # Filtro por tipo
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                if params[:type].present?
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                  case params[:type]
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  when "received"
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                    sent_messages = sent_messages.none
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  when "sent"
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                    received_messages = received_messages.none
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                  end
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                end
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

            
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                # Filtro de busca
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                if params[:search].present?
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  search_term = "%#{params[:search]}%"
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  sent_messages = sent_messages.joins(:recipient)
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                                              .where("messages.subject ILIKE ? OR messages.body ILIKE ? OR users.full_name ILIKE ?",
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                                                     search_term, search_term, search_term)
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  received_messages = received_messages.joins(:sender)
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                                                      .where("messages.subject ILIKE ? OR messages.body ILIKE ? OR users.full_name ILIKE ?",
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                                                             search_term, search_term, search_term)
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                end
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

            
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                @sent_messages = sent_messages.includes(:recipient).order(created_at: :desc).limit(50)
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                @received_messages = received_messages.includes(:sender).order(created_at: :desc).limit(50)
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                @unread_count = current_user.received_messages.unread.count

    49. 
            

            

              end
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

            
          
      51.

              def show

              def broadcast_to_classroom

    158. 
            

            

                @school = current_user.school
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                classroom_id = params[:classroom_id]
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                subject = params[:subject]
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                body = params[:body]
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

            
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                classroom = @school.classrooms.find(classroom_id)
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                users_to_notify = classroom.students # Usando a associao correta
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

            
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                users_to_notify.find_each do |user|
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                  Message.create!(
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                    sender: current_user,
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                    recipient: user,
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                    school: @school,
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                    subject: subject,
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                    body: body
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                  )
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                end
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

            
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                redirect_to direction_messages_path,
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                            notice: "Comunicado enviado para a turma #{classroom.name} (#{users_to_notify.count} pessoas)."
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

              end
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

            
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

              private
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

            
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

            
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

              def set_message
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                @message = Message.where(
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                  "(sender_id = ? OR recipient_id = ?)",
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                  current_user.id, current_user.id
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                ).find(params[:id])
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

              end
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

            
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

              def message_params
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                params.require(:message).permit(:recipient_id, :subject, :body)
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

              end
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

            end

              def attendance_report
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                @school = current_user.school
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                @classrooms = @school.classrooms.includes(:students)
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

            
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                # Filtros
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                @selected_classroom = params[:classroom_id].present? ? @school.classrooms.find(params[:classroom_id]) : nil
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                @date_from = params[:date_from].present? ? Date.parse(params[:date_from]) : 1.month.ago.to_date
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                @date_to = params[:date_to].present? ? Date.parse(params[:date_to]) : Date.current
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

            
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                # Dados de frequncia
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                if @selected_classroom
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  @attendance_data = attendance_data_for_classroom(@selected_classroom, @date_from, @date_to)
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                else
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  @attendance_data = attendance_data_for_school(@date_from, @date_to)
          
      41.

                end
          
      42.

    51.
