              def generate_pdf
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                @school = current_user.school
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

            
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                # Coletar dados para o PDF
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                @students_report = {
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                  total: User.where(school_id: @school.id, user_type: "student").count,
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                  by_classroom: classroom_student_stats
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                }
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

            
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                @teachers_report = {
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                  total: User.where(school_id: @school.id, user_type: "teacher").count,
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                  subjects_assigned: teacher_subject_stats
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                }
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

            
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                @academic_report = {
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                  attendance_rate: calculate_school_attendance_rate,
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                  average_grades: calculate_school_average_grades
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                }
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

            
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                respond_to do |format|
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                  format.pdf do
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                    render pdf: "relatorio_geral_#{@school.name.parameterize}_#{Date.current.strftime('%Y%m%d')}",
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                           template: "direction/reports/generate_pdf",
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                           layout: "pdf",
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                           page_size: "A4",
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                           margin: { top: 20, bottom: 20, left: 15, right: 15 },
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                           header: { html: { template: "shared/pdf_header" } },
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                           footer: { html: { template: "shared/pdf_footer" } }
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                  end
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

            
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                  format.html do
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                    # Fallback para HTML se PDF no funcionar
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                    render :index
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                  end
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                end
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

              rescue => e
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "Erro na gerao de PDF: #{e.message}"
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                redirect_to direction_reports_path, alert: "Erro ao gerar PDF. Tente novamente."
          
      118.

      119.

              private
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

            
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

              def classroom_student_stats
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                Classroom.where(school_id: current_user.school.id)
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                         .left_joins(:students)
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                         .group("classrooms.name")
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                         .count("users.id")
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

              end
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

            
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

              def teacher_subject_stats
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                User.where(school_id: current_user.school.id, user_type: "teacher")
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                    .joins("LEFT JOIN subjects ON subjects.user_id = users.id")
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                    .group("users.first_name", "users.last_name")
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                    .count("subjects.id")
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

              end
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

            
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

              def calculate_school_attendance_rate
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                # Calculate based on absences vs total possible class days for students
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                students = User.where(school_id: current_user.school.id, user_type: "student")
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                return 0 if students.empty?
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

            
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                total_absences = Absence.joins(:student)
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                                       .where(users: { school_id: current_user.school.id })
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                                       .where("date >= ?", 30.days.ago)
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                                       .count
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

            
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                # Estimate total possible attendances (students * school days in period)
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                school_days_in_period = 22 # approximate school days in 30 days
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                total_possible_attendances = students.count * school_days_in_period
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

            
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                return 0 if total_possible_attendances.zero?
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

            
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                ((total_possible_attendances - total_absences).to_f / total_possible_attendances * 100).round(1)
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

              end
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

            
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

              def calculate_school_average_grades
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                Grade.joins(:student)
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                     .where(users: { school_id: current_user.school.id })
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                     .where("grades.created_at >= ?", 30.days.ago)
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                     .average(:value)&.round(2) || 0
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

              end
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

            
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

              def attendance_data_for_classroom(classroom, date_from, date_to)
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                students = classroom.students
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                attendance_data = {}
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

            
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                students.each do |student|
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                  absences = student.absences.where(date: date_from..date_to).count
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                  total_days = (date_to - date_from).to_i + 1
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                  attendance_rate = ((total_days - absences).to_f / total_days * 100).round(1)
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

            
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                  attendance_data[student.full_name] = {
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                    absences: absences,
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                    attendance_rate: attendance_rate,
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                    total_days: total_days
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                  }
          
      176.

                end
          
      177.

                attendance_data

              end

              def attendance_data_for_school(date_from, date_to)
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                current_user.school.classrooms.includes(:students).map do |classroom|
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                  students_data = attendance_data_for_classroom(classroom, date_from, date_to)
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                  average_attendance = students_data.values.map { |data| data[:attendance_rate] }.sum / students_data.size if students_data.any?
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

            
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                  {
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                    classroom_name: classroom.name,
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                    students_count: students_data.size,
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                    average_attendance: average_attendance&.round(1) || 0,
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                    students_data: students_data
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191.

    192. 
            

            

                end
          
      193.

              def grades_data_for_classroom(classroom, subject = nil)
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                query = Grade.joins(:user)
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                             .where(users: { classroom_id: classroom.id })
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

            
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                query = query.joins(:subject).where(subjects: { id: subject.id }) if subject
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

            
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                grades = query.includes(:user, :subject)
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

            
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                grades.group_by(&:user).map do |student, student_grades|
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                  {
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                    student_name: student.full_name,
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                    grades: student_grades.map { |g| { subject: g.subject.name, grade: g.value } },
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                    average: student_grades.sum(&:value) / student_grades.size.to_f
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                  }
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                end
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

              end
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

            
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

              def grades_data_for_school(subject = nil)
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                current_user.school.classrooms.includes(:students).map do |classroom|
          
      214.

                  classroom_grades = grades_data_for_classroom(classroom, subject)
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215.

      216.

      217.

              def generate_student_bulletin(student)
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

                return nil unless student.classroom && student.school_id == current_user.school.id
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

            
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

                classroom = student.classroom
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                subjects = classroom.subjects.includes(:grades, :absences)
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

            
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

                bulletin_data = {
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

                  student: student,
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

                  classroom: classroom,
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

                  subjects_data: []
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

                }
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

            
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

                subjects.each do |subject|
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

                  student_grades = subject.grades.where(user_id: student.id)
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

                  student_absences = subject.absences.where(user_id: student.id).count
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

            
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

                  average_grade = student_grades.any? ? student_grades.average(:value).round(1) : 0
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

            
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

                  bulletin_data[:subjects_data] << {
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

                    subject_name: subject.name,
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            

                    grades: student_grades.pluck(:value),
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            

                    average: average_grade,
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            

                    absences: student_absences,
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            

                    teacher: subject.user&.full_name
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            

                  }
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            

                end
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            

            
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            

                bulletin_data

      255.

              def calculate_grade_distribution
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            

                Grade.joins(:user)
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            

                     .where(users: { school_id: current_user.school.id })
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            

                     .group("CASE
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            

                               WHEN value >= 9 THEN '9-10'
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            

                               WHEN value >= 7 THEN '7-8.9'
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            

                               WHEN value >= 5 THEN '5-6.9'
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            

                               ELSE 'Abaixo de 5'
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            

                             END")
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            

                     .count
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            

              end
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            

            
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            

              def calculate_attendance_trends
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            

                3.downto(0).map do |months_ago|
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            

            

                  start_date = months_ago.months.ago.beginning_of_month
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            

            

                  end_date = months_ago.months.ago.end_of_month
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            

            

                  month_name = start_date.strftime("%B/%Y")
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            

            

            
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            

            

                  attendance_rate = calculate_month_attendance_rate(start_date, end_date)
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            

            

            
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            

            

                  { month: month_name, attendance_rate: attendance_rate }
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            

            

                end
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            

            

              end
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            

            

            
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            

            

              def calculate_month_attendance_rate(start_date, end_date)
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            

            

                total_students = User.where(school_id: current_user.school.id, user_type: "student").count
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            

            

                return 0 if total_students.zero?
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            

            

            
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            

            

                total_absences = Absence.joins(:user)
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            

            

                                       .where(users: { school_id: current_user.school.id })
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            

            

                                       .where(date: start_date..end_date)
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            

            

                                       .count
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            

            

            
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            

            

                days_in_period = (end_date.to_date - start_date.to_date).to_i + 1
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            

            

                expected_presences = total_students * days_in_period
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            

            

            
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            

            

                return 95.0 if total_absences.zero?
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293. 
            

            

                [ 100.0 - (total_absences.to_f / expected_presences * 100), 0 ].max.round(1)
          
      294. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    294. 
            

            

              end
          
      295. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    295. 
            

            

            
          
      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            

            

              def calculate_subject_performance
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            

            

                Subject.joins(classroom: :school)
          
      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            

            

                       .where(schools: { id: current_user.school.id })
          
      299. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    299. 
            

            

                       .joins("LEFT JOIN grades ON subjects.id = grades.subject_id")
          
      300. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    300. 
            

            

                       .group("subjects.name")
          
      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301. 
            

            

                       .average("grades.value")
          
      302. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    302. 
            

            

                       .transform_values { |avg| avg&.round(1) || 0 }
          
      303. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    303. 
            

            

              end
          
      304. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    304. 
            

            

            
          
      305. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    305. 
            

            

              def calculate_classroom_comparison
          
      306. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    306. 
            

            

                current_user.school.classrooms.includes(:grades).map do |classroom|
          
      307. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    307. 
            

            

                  grades = classroom.grades
          
      308. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    308. 
            

            

                  average_grade = grades.any? ? grades.average(:value).round(1) : 0
          
      309. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    309. 
            

            

                  students_count = classroom.students.count
          
      310. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    310. 
            

            

            
          
      311. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    311. 
            

            

                  {
          
      312. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    312. 
            

            

                    name: classroom.name,
          
      313. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    313. 
            

            

                    average_grade: average_grade,
          
      314. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    314. 
            

            

                    students_count: students_count
          
      315. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    315. 
            

            

                  }
          
      316. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    316. 
            

            

                end
          
      317. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    317. 
            

            

              end
          
      318. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    318. 
            

            

            end

            class Direction::StudentsController < ApplicationController
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              before_action :authenticate_user!
          
      3.

              before_action :ensure_direction!
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              before_action :set_student, only: [ :show, :edit, :update, :destroy ]
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

            
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              def index
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                @school = current_user.school
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                @students = User.where(school_id: @school.id, user_type: "student")
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                               .includes(:classroom)
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                               .distinct
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

            
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                # Filtros
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                if params[:search].present?
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  @students = @students.where("users.first_name ILIKE ? OR users.last_name ILIKE ? OR users.email ILIKE ?",
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                                             "%#{params[:search]}%", "%#{params[:search]}%", "%#{params[:search]}%")
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                end
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

            
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                if params[:classroom_id].present?
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  @students = @students.where(classroom_id: params[:classroom_id])
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                end
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21.

                @students = @students.order(:first_name, :last_name)
          
      23.

                @classrooms = Classroom.where(school: @school)
          
      24.

              end
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

            
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

              def show
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                @grades = Grade.where(user_id: @student.id).includes(:subject).order(created_at: :desc).limit(10)
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                @absences = Absence.where(user_id: @student.id).order(date: :desc).limit(10)
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

              end
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

            
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

              def new
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                @user = User.new

            class MessagesController < ApplicationController
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              before_action :authenticate_user!
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              before_action :redirect_to_specific_controller
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

            
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              private
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

            
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              def redirect_to_specific_controller
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                # Redirecionar para o controller especfico baseado no tipo de usurio
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                redirect_url = case current_user.user_type
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                when "admin"
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  admin_messages_path
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                when "direction"
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  direction_messages_path
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                when "teacher"
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                  teachers_messages_path
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                when "student"
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  students_messages_path
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                else
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  root_path
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                end
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

            
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                redirect_to redirect_url

              end

            class NotificationsController < ApplicationController
          
      2.

              before_action :authenticate_user!

              before_action :set_notification, only: [ :show, :mark_as_read, :destroy ]

    4. 
            

            

            
          
      5.

              def index

                                            .includes(:sender, :school)

              def mark_all_as_read

            class Students::AbsencesController < ApplicationController

              before_action :authenticate_user!

              before_action :ensure_student

    4. 
            

            

            
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              def index
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                # Verificar se o usurio tem uma turma
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                unless current_user.classroom
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                  redirect_to students_root_path, alert: "Voc no est matriculado em nenhuma turma."
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                  return
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                end
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

            
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                # Buscar disciplinas atravs dos horrios da turma do aluno
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                @subjects = current_user.classroom.class_schedules.includes(:subject).map(&:subject).uniq

    14. 
            

            

            
          
      15.

                # Buscar todas as ausncias do aluno (antes dos filtros)

      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18.

    19.

    20. 
            

            

            
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                # Aplicar filtros se fornecidos
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                if params[:subject_id].present?
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  @absences = @absences.where(subject_id: params[:subject_id])
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                end
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

            
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                if params[:period].present?
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                  case params[:period]
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  when "current_month"
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                    @absences = @absences.where(date: Date.current.beginning_of_month..Date.current.end_of_month)

    30. 
            

            

                  when "last_month"
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                    last_month = Date.current.last_month
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                    @absences = @absences.where(date: last_month.beginning_of_month..last_month.end_of_month)
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  when "current_quarter"
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                    # Aproximadamente 3 meses (trimestre)
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                    quarter_start = 3.months.ago.beginning_of_month
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                    @absences = @absences.where(date: quarter_start..Date.current.end_of_month)
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  when "current_semester"
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38.

      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                    semester_start = 6.months.ago.beginning_of_month
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40.

    41. 
            

            

                  when "current_year"
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                    @absences = @absences.where(date: Date.current.beginning_of_year..Date.current.end_of_year)
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43.

      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                end
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

            
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                if params[:status].present?

                  case params[:status]

                  when "justified"

                # Calcular informaes de frequncia para cada disciplina (usando todas as ausncias, no filtradas)
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                @attendance_data = {}
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                @subjects.each do |subject|
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  # Contar horrios semanais desta disciplina para a turma do aluno
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  weekly_classes = current_user.classroom.class_schedules.where(subject: subject).count
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

            
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  # Calcular semanas passadas desde incio do ano letivo (aproximadamente)
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                  year_start = Date.new(Date.current.year, 2, 1) # Assumindo que o ano letivo comea em fevereiro
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                  weeks_passed = [ (Date.current - year_start).to_i / 7, 1 ].max
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

            
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                  # Total de aulas at agora
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                  total_classes = weekly_classes * weeks_passed
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

            
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                  # Ausncias desta disciplina (todas, no filtradas)
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                  subject_absences = all_absences.where(subject: subject).count
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

            
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                  # Taxa de presena
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                  attendance_rate = total_classes > 0 ? ((total_classes - subject_absences).to_f / total_classes * 100).round(1) : 100
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

            
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                  @attendance_data[subject.id] = {
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                    weekly_classes: weekly_classes,
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                    total_classes: total_classes,
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                    absences: subject_absences,
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                    attendance_rate: attendance_rate,
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                    present_classes: [ total_classes - subject_absences, 0 ].max
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                  }
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                end
          
      82.

                # Resumo de faltas por disciplina (apenas das disciplinas dos horrios da turma)

                @subjects.each do |subject|

                  monthly_data = []

    119.

    app/controllers/students/calendars_controller.rb

            class Students::CalendarsController < ApplicationController
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              before_action :authenticate_user!
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              before_action :authorize_student!
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

            
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              def index
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                # Definir o ms e ano atual ou baseado nos parmetros
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                @current_date = params[:date] ? Date.parse(params[:date]) : Date.current
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                @current_month = @current_date.beginning_of_month
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                @current_year = @current_date.year
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

            
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                # Buscar eventos do ms atual baseado no tipo de usurio
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                month_start = @current_month.beginning_of_month
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                month_end = @current_month.end_of_month

              def build_calendar_query(month_start, month_end)
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                calendars = Calendar.includes(:school).where(date: month_start..month_end)
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

            
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                if current_user.school_id.present?
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                  calendars.where(
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                    "(all_schools = ? OR school_id = ?)",
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                    true, current_user.school_id
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                  )
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                else
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                  # Estudante sem escola v apenas eventos municipais
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                  calendars.where(all_schools: true)
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                end
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

              end
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

            
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

              def build_events_query(month_start, month_end)
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                events = Event.includes(:school).where(
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                  "COALESCE(start_date, event_date) >= ? AND COALESCE(start_date, event_date) <= ?",
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                  month_start, month_end
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                )
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

            
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                if current_user.school_id.present?
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                  events.where(
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                    "(is_municipal = ? OR school_id = ?)",
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                    true, current_user.school_id
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                  )
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                else
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                  # Estudante sem escola v apenas eventos municipais
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                  events.where(is_municipal: true)
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                end
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

              end
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

            end
          
      91.

              def index

                # Mapeamento de dias da semana (0=domingo, 1=segunda, etc.)
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                weekday_map = {
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  1 => "monday",
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  2 => "tuesday",

    41. 
            

            

                  0 => "sunday"
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                }
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

            
          
      44.

                # Organizar horrios por dia e horrio para a grade de horrios
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                @schedules_by_day_time = {}
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                @time_slots = Set.new
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

            
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                @schedules.each do |schedule|
          
      49.

                  day_name = weekday_map[schedule.weekday]
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                  time_slot = "#{schedule.start_time.strftime('%H:%M')} - #{schedule.end_time.strftime('%H:%M')}"
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

            
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  @schedules_by_day_time[day_name] ||= {}

      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  @time_slots.add(time_slot)
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                end
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

            
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                @time_slots = @time_slots.to_a.sort
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

              end
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59.

            class Students::DashboardController < ApplicationController
          
      2.

              before_action :authenticate_user!
          
      3.

              before_action :ensure_student!
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

            
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              def index
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                @student = current_user
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                @classroom = @student.classroom
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                @subjects = @classroom&.subjects || []
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                @total_subjects = @subjects.count

                # Grades and performance
          
      12.

                @recent_grades = @student.grades.includes(:subject).order(created_at: :desc).limit(5)
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                @overall_average = calculate_overall_average
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

            
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                # Messages
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                @recent_messages = @student.received_messages.unread.order(created_at: :desc).limit(5)
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                @unread_messages = @student.received_messages.unread.count
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

            
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                # Attendance

                @total_absences = @student.absences.count

    21. 
            

            

                @attendance_rate = calculate_attendance_rate

    22. 
            

            

            
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                # Schedule

                @today_schedule = get_today_schedule

                # Events

                @upcoming_events = Event.where(school: @student.school)

                                       .where("start_date >= ?", Date.current)

              private
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

            
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

              def ensure_student!
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                unless current_user&.student?
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  redirect_to root_path, alert: "Acesso no autorizado."
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                end
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

              end
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

            
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

              def calculate_overall_average
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                grades = @student.grades.where.not(value: nil)
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                return 0 if grades.empty?
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

            
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                (grades.sum(:value) / grades.count.to_f).round(2)
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

              end
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

            
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

              def calculate_attendance_rate
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                return 100 if @classroom.nil?
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

            
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                # Calcular com base no perodo letivo (assumindo que j passou algumas semanas)
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                weeks_passed = [ (Date.current - Date.current.beginning_of_year).to_i / 7, 1 ].max
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                total_possible_classes = @classroom.class_schedules.count * weeks_passed
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

            
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                return 100 if total_possible_classes == 0
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

            
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                present_classes = total_possible_classes - @total_absences
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                attendance_rate = ((present_classes.to_f / total_possible_classes) * 100).round(0)
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

            
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                # Garantir que no seja negativo
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                [ attendance_rate, 0 ].max
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

              end
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

            
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

              def get_today_schedule
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                return [] if @classroom.nil?
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

            
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                # Converter dia atual para nmero (0=Domingo, 1=Segunda, ..., 6=Sbado)
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                today_weekday = Date.current.wday
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

            
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                @classroom.class_schedules
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                          .joins(:subject)
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                          .includes(subject: :user)
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                          .where(weekday: today_weekday)
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                          .order(:start_time)
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

              end
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

            end
          
      77.

                @documents = Document.joins(:school)

                                    .where(school: current_user.school)

                subjects.each do |subject|

                  @grades_data[subject] = {}

                  subject_total = 0

    135. 
            

            

                  subject_count = 0
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136.

    137. 
            

            

                  @bimesters.each do |bimester|

    139. 
            

            

                                     .where(subject: subject, bimester: bimester)

      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                    if grades.any?
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                      # Calcular mdia das notas do bimestre para a disciplina
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                      bimester_average = grades.average(:value).round(1)
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                      @grades_data[subject][bimester] = bimester_average
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                      subject_total += bimester_average
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                      subject_count += 1
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                    else
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                      @grades_data[subject][bimester] = nil
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                    end
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                  end
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

            
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                  # Calcular mdia do perodo da disciplina
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                  @subject_averages[subject] = subject_count > 0 ? (subject_total / subject_count).round(1) : nil
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                end
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

            
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                # Calcular mdias por bimestre (todas as disciplinas)

    157. 
            

            

                @bimesters.each do |bimester|
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                  bimester_grades = []
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                  @grades_data.each do |subject, bimesters|
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                    if bimesters[bimester].present?
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                      bimester_grades << bimesters[bimester]
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                    end
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                  end
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                  @bimester_averages[bimester] = bimester_grades.any? ? (bimester_grades.sum / bimester_grades.size).round(1) : nil
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                end
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

            
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                # Calcular mdia geral do perodo
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                all_subject_averages = @subject_averages.values.compact
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                @overall_average = all_subject_averages.any? ? (all_subject_averages.sum / all_subject_averages.size).round(1) : nil
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

            
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                # Gerar PDF do boletim

                respond_to do |format|
