    173. 
            

            

                  format.pdf do
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                    pdf = generate_report_card_pdf
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                    period_suffix = selected_bimester > 0 ? "_#{@period_label.parameterize}" : ""
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                    send_data pdf, filename: "boletim_#{@student.full_name.parameterize}#{period_suffix}_#{Date.current.strftime('%Y%m%d')}.pdf",
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                                   type: "application/pdf",
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                                   disposition: "attachment"
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                  end
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                  format.html { redirect_to generate_report_card_students_documents_path(format: :pdf) }
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                end
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

              end
          
      183.

              private

              def set_document
          
      187.

                @document = Document.find(params[:id])

      189.

              def ensure_student

                redirect_to root_path unless current_user.student?

      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

            
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

              def document_params
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                params.require(:document).permit(:title, :description, :document_type, :attachment)
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

              end
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

            
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

              def generate_report_card_pdf
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                begin
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                  require "prawn"
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                  require "prawn/table"
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                  # Suprimir warning UTF-8
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                  Prawn::Fonts::AFM.hide_m17n_warning = true
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                rescue LoadError
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                  raise LoadError, "Prawn gem is required for PDF generation. Please run 'bundle install' and restart the server."
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                end
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

            
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                Prawn::Document.new(page_size: "A4", margin: [ 50, 50, 50, 50 ]) do |pdf|
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                  # Configurar fonte
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                  pdf.font "Helvetica"
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

            
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                  # Cabealho com logo (se houver) e ttulo
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                  pdf.text_box "BOLETIM ESCOLAR", at: [ 0, pdf.cursor ], width: 540, align: :center,
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                               style: :bold, size: 20, color: "2c3e50"
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                  
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                  # Subttulo com perodo selecionado
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                  pdf.move_down 30
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                  pdf.text_box @period_label, at: [ 0, pdf.cursor ], width: 540, align: :center,
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                               style: :bold, size: 14, color: "3498db"
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

            
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                  pdf.move_down 30
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

            
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                  # Informaes da escola em caixa destacada
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                  pdf.stroke_color "d5d5d5"
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                  pdf.stroke_rectangle [ 0, pdf.cursor ], 540, 60
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

                  pdf.fill_color "f8f9fa"
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

                  pdf.fill_rectangle [ 0, pdf.cursor ], 540, 60
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

                  pdf.fill_color "000000"
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

            
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                  pdf.move_down 15
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

                  pdf.indent(10) do
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

                    pdf.text "#{@school.name}", style: :bold, size: 14
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

                    if @school.address.present?
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

                      pdf.text "#{@school.address}", size: 10
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

                    end
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

                    pdf.text "Ano Letivo: #{Date.current.year}", style: :bold, size: 10
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

                  end
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

            
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

                  pdf.move_down 30
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

            
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

                  # Informaes do aluno
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

                  pdf.text "DADOS DO ALUNO", style: :bold, size: 14, color: "2c3e50"
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

                  pdf.move_down 5
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

                  pdf.stroke_color "3498db"
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

                  pdf.line_width 2
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            

                  pdf.stroke_horizontal_line 0, 100, at: pdf.cursor
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            

                  pdf.move_down 15
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            

            
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            

                  info_data = [
          
      250.

                    [ "Nome:", @student.full_name ],

      253.

      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            

                  ]
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            

            
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            

                  pdf.table info_data, width: 540, cell_style: { borders: [], padding: [ 2, 0 ] } do
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            

                    columns(0).font_style = :bold
          
      258.

                    columns(0).width = 120
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            

                  end
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            

            
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            

                  pdf.move_down 30
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            

            
          
      263.

                  # Ttulo da seo de notas
          
      264.

      265.

                  @grades_data.each do |subject, bimesters|

                    row = []

                    row << subject.name
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287.

                    @bimesters.each do |bimester|

      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            

            

                    end
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292.

                    avg = @subject_averages[subject]

      295.

      296.

                    if avg.present?

      302.

                    table_data << row
          
      304. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    304. 
            

            

                  end
          
      305. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    305. 
            

            

            
          
      306.

                  # Adicionar linha de mdias por bimestre

    307. 
            

            

                  if @bimester_averages.any? { |_, avg| avg.present? }
          
      308. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    308. 
            

            

                    avg_row = [ "MDIA GERAL" ]
          
      309. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    309. 
            

            

                    @bimesters.each do |bimester|

                      avg = @bimester_averages[bimester]

      313.

      314.

                        avg_row << "EM RECUPERAO"

                      end
          
      321. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    321.

                      avg_row << "EM ANLISE"

    323.

      324. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    324.

                    table_data << avg_row
          
      326.

      327.

      328.

                  bimester_columns_count = @bimesters.size

                  pdf.table table_data, header: true, width: 540 do
          
      331.

                    row(0).font_style = :bold

                    row(0).background_color = "3498db"

                    row(0).text_color = "ffffff"

      335. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    335. 
            

            

                    if table_data.length > 1
          
      336. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    336. 
            

            

                      row(-1).font_style = :bold
          
      337.

                      row(-1).background_color = "ecf0f1"
          
      338.

      339.

                    # Centralizar colunas dos bimestres, mdia e situao dinamicamente

                    columns(1..(bimester_columns_count + 1)).align = :center
          
      342.

      343.

                    self.cell_style = {
          
      344.

                      size: 10,

                      border_color: "bdc3c7"
          
      347.

                    }
          
      348. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    348. 
            

            

            
          
      349. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    349. 
            

            

                    # Colorir situaes
          
      350. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    350. 
            

            

                    if table_data.length > 1
          
      351. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    351. 
            

            

                      (1...table_data.length).each do |i|
          
      352. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    352. 
            

            

                        situation_col_index = bimester_columns_count + 2
          
      353. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    353. 
            

            

                        if table_data[i][situation_col_index] == "Aprovado"
          
      354. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    354. 
            

            

                          self.row(i).columns(situation_col_index).background_color = "d5f4e6"
          
      355. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    355. 
            

            

                          self.row(i).columns(situation_col_index).text_color = "27ae60"
          
      356. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    356. 
            

            

                        elsif table_data[i][situation_col_index] == "Reprovado"
          
      357. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    357. 
            

            

                          self.row(i).columns(situation_col_index).background_color = "fadbd8"
          
      358. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    358. 
            

            

                          self.row(i).columns(situation_col_index).text_color = "e74c3c"
          
      359. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    359. 
            

            

                        end
          
      360. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    360. 
            

            

                      end
          
      361. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    361. 
            

            

                    end
          
      362. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    362. 
            

            

                  end
          
      363. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    363. 
            

            

            
          
      364. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    364. 
            

            

                  pdf.move_down 30

                  pdf.indent(10) do

                    pdf.text " Mdia mnima para aprovao: 6,0", size: 9

      379.

                  pdf.move_down 30

                  # Data e assinatura

    383. 
            

            

                  pdf.text_box "______________________________", at: [ 350, pdf.cursor ], width: 190, align: :center
          
      384.

                  pdf.move_down 15
          
      385.

                  pdf.text_box "Direo Escolar", at: [ 350, pdf.cursor ], width: 190, align: :center, size: 10, style: :bold
          
      386.

      387.

                  pdf.move_down 40

    389. 
            

            

                  # Footer

    390. 
            

            

                  pdf.text "Este documento foi gerado automaticamente em #{Time.current.strftime('%d/%m/%Y s %H:%M')}",
          
      391. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    391. 
            

            

                           size: 8, style: :italic, align: :center, color: "7f8c8d"
          
      392. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    392. 
            

            

                end.render
          
      393. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    393. 
            

            

              end
          
      394.

            end
          
      395.

    app/controllers/students/events_controller.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    63 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 63 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            class Students::EventsController < ApplicationController
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              before_action :authenticate_user!

              def index

                # Verificar se o usurio tem escola associada

                @events = current_user.school.events

                # Aplicar filtros baseados nos parmetros
          
      15.

                if params[:period].present?
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  case params[:period]
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  when "week"
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                    @events = @events.where(start_date: Date.current..Date.current + 7.days)
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  when "month"
          
      20.

                    @events = @events.where(start_date: Date.current..Date.current + 30.days)
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  when "current_month"
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22.

      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  when "past"
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                    @events = @events.where("end_date < ?", Date.current)
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  else
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                    # 'all' ou sem filtro - mostrar futuros por padro
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                    @events = @events.where("start_date >= ?", Date.current) unless params[:period] == "all"
          
      28.

      29.

    31.

      33.

    6. 
            

            

                return redirect_to students_dashboard_path, alert: "Voc no est em nenhuma turma." unless current_user.classroom
          
      7.

      8.

    9. 
            

            

            
          
      10.

                @grades_by_subject = {}

    11. 
            

            

                if current_user.classroom&.class_schedules&.any?
          
      12.

                  # Buscar disciplinas atravs dos horrios da turma

                end

                # Calcular mdia geral usando as disciplinas dos horrios

            class Students::MessagesController < ApplicationController
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              before_action :authenticate_user!
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              before_action :ensure_student!
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              before_action :set_message, only: [ :show ]
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

            
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              def index
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                # Aplicar filtros
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                sent_messages = current_user.sent_messages.where(school: current_user.school)
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                received_messages = current_user.received_messages.where(school: current_user.school)
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

            
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                # Filtro por status
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                if params[:status].present?
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  case params[:status]
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  when "unread"
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                    sent_messages = sent_messages.where(read: false)
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                    received_messages = received_messages.unread
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  when "read"
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                    sent_messages = sent_messages.where(read: true)
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                    received_messages = received_messages.where(read_at: nil..)
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  end
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                end
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

            
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                # Filtro por tipo
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                if params[:type].present?
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  case params[:type]
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                  when "received"
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                    sent_messages = sent_messages.none
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  when "sent"
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                    received_messages = received_messages.none
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  end
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                end
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

            
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                # Filtro de busca
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                if params[:search].present?
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  search_term = "%#{params[:search]}%"
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  sent_messages = sent_messages.joins(:recipient)
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                                              .where("messages.subject ILIKE ? OR messages.body ILIKE ? OR users.full_name ILIKE ?",
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                                                     search_term, search_term, search_term)
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  received_messages = received_messages.joins(:sender)
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                                                      .where("messages.subject ILIKE ? OR messages.body ILIKE ? OR users.full_name ILIKE ?",
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                                                             search_term, search_term, search_term)
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                end
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

            
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                @sent_messages = sent_messages.order(created_at: :desc).limit(50)
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                @received_messages = received_messages.order(created_at: :desc).limit(50)
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                @unread_count = current_user.received_messages.unread.count
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

              end
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

            
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

              def show
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                @message.mark_as_read! if @message.recipient == current_user && !@message.read?
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

              end
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

            
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

              def new
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                @message = current_user.sent_messages.build
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

              end
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

            
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

              def create
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                @message = current_user.sent_messages.build(message_params)
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                @message.school = current_user.school
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

            
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                if @message.save
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                  redirect_to students_messages_path, notice: "Mensagem enviada com sucesso."
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                else
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                  @recipient_service = MessageRecipientService.new(current_user)
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                  render :new
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                end
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

              end
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

            
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

              private
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

            
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

              def set_message
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                @message = current_user.received_messages
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                                      .or(current_user.sent_messages)
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                                      .find(params[:id])
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

              end
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

            
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

              def message_params
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                params.require(:message).permit(:recipient_id, :subject, :body)
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

              end
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

            
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

              def ensure_student!

                redirect_to root_path unless current_user.student?

              end

            end

    app/controllers/students/profile_controller.rb

            class Students::ProfilesController < ApplicationController
          
      2.

              before_action :authenticate_user!

              before_action :ensure_student!
          
      4.

      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              def show
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6.

              def determine_current_semester

              def calculate_attendance_rate(subject)
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                # Esta  uma implementao bsica - voc pode refinar baseado no seu modelo de dados
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                total_classes = 20 # Valor padro
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                absences = Absence.where(
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                  user_id: current_user.id,
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                  subject: subject,
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                  date: Date.current.beginning_of_year..Date.current.end_of_year
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                ).count
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

            
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                present_classes = [ total_classes - absences, 0 ].max
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                return 0 if total_classes.zero?
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

            
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                (present_classes.to_f / total_classes * 100).round(1)
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

              end

            class Teachers::AbsencesController < ApplicationController

              def index

              def attendance

                @subjects_grouped = all_subjects.group_by(&:name).map do |name, subjects|
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                  representative_subject = subjects.first
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  representative_subject.define_singleton_method(:grouped_subjects) { subjects }
          
      20.

                  representative_subject
          
      21.

      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                @date = params[:date] ? Date.parse(params[:date]) : Date.current
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

            
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                # Carregar dados baseados nos parmetros
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                load_attendance_data
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

            
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                # Buscar faltas j registradas para esta data, disciplina e turma
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                if @current_subject && @selected_classroom && @date
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  existing_absences = @current_subject.absences.where(
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                    date: @date,
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                    user_id: @students.pluck(:id)
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  )
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  @absent_student_ids = existing_absences.pluck(:user_id)
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                else
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  @absent_student_ids = []
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                end
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

              end
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

            
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

              def get_classrooms
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                subject_name = params[:subject_name]
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

            
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                if subject_name.present?
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                  subject_instances = current_user.teacher_subjects.select { |s| s.name == subject_name }
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                  classrooms = subject_instances.map(&:available_classrooms).flatten.uniq
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

            
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                  render json: {
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                    classrooms: classrooms.map { |c| { id: c.id, name: c.name } }
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  }
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                else
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  render json: { classrooms: [] }
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                end
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

              end
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

            
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

              def get_students
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                subject_name = params[:subject_name]
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                classroom_id = params[:classroom_id]
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                date = params[:date] ? Date.parse(params[:date]) : Date.current
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

            
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                if subject_name.present? && classroom_id.present?
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                  classroom = Classroom.find(classroom_id)
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                  subject_instances = current_user.teacher_subjects.select { |s| s.name == subject_name }
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                  subject = subject_instances.find { |s| s.available_classrooms.include?(classroom) }
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

            
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                  if subject
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                    students = subject.students_from_classroom(classroom_id)
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

            
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                    # Buscar faltas j registradas para esta data
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                    existing_absences = subject.absences.where(
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                      date: date,
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                      user_id: students.pluck(:id)
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                    )
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                    absent_student_ids = existing_absences.pluck(:user_id)
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

            
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                    render json: {
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                      students: students.map { |s| {
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                        id: s.id,
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                        name: s.full_name,
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                        email: s.email,
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                        is_absent: absent_student_ids.include?(s.id)
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                      } },
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                      date: date.strftime("%d/%m/%Y")
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                    }
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                  else
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                    render json: { students: [], date: date.strftime("%d/%m/%Y") }
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                  end
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                else
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                  render json: { students: [], date: date.strftime("%d/%m/%Y") }
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                end
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

              end
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

            
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

              def bulk_create
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                begin
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                  @selected_classroom = Classroom.find(params[:classroom_id])
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                  @date = Date.parse(params[:date])
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

            
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                  # Encontrar a instncia correta da disciplina para esta turma
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                  subject_name = params[:subject_name]
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                  subject_instances = current_user.teacher_subjects.select { |s| s.name == subject_name }
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                  @subject = subject_instances.find { |s| s.available_classrooms.include?(@selected_classroom) }
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

            
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                  unless @subject
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                    redirect_to attendance_teachers_absences_path, alert: "Disciplina no encontrada para esta turma."
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                    return
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                  end
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

            
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                  @students = @subject.students_from_classroom(@selected_classroom.id)
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

            
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                  # Obter lista de alunos faltosos
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                  # Remover valores vazios e duplicados
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                  absent_student_ids = (params[:absent_students] || []).reject(&:blank?).uniq
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                  
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                  # Log para debug
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "=== BULK CREATE ABSENCES ==="
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Subject: #{@subject.name} (ID: #{@subject.id})"
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Classroom: #{@selected_classroom.name} (ID: #{@selected_classroom.id})"
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Date: #{@date}"
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Absent students IDs: #{absent_student_ids.inspect}"
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Total students in classroom: #{@students.count}"
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

            
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                  # Limpar faltas existentes para esta data/disciplina/turma
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                  existing_absences = @subject.absences.where(
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                    date: @date,
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                    user_id: @students.pluck(:id)
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                  )
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                  deleted_count = existing_absences.count
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                  existing_absences.destroy_all
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

            
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                  # Criar novas faltas
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                  success_count = 0
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                  errors = []
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                  absent_student_ids.each do |student_id|
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                    student = @students.find_by(id: student_id.to_i)
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                    if student
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                      absence = @subject.absences.build(
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                        user_id: student_id,
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                        date: @date,
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                        justified: false
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                      )
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                      if absence.save
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                        success_count += 1
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                        Rails.logger.info "Absence created for student #{student.full_name} (ID: #{student_id})"
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                      else
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                        error_msg = "Erro ao salvar falta do aluno #{student.full_name} (ID #{student_id}): #{absence.errors.full_messages.join(', ')}"
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                        errors << error_msg
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                        Rails.logger.error error_msg
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                      end
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                    else
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.warn "Student ID #{student_id} not found in classroom"
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                    end
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                  end
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

            
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                  # Log dos erros se houver
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                  if errors.any?
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "=== ERRORS IN BULK CREATE ==="
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                    errors.each { |e| Rails.logger.error e }
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                    redirect_to attendance_teachers_absences_path(
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                      subject_name: subject_name,
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                      classroom_id: @selected_classroom.id,
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                      date: @date
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                    ), alert: "Erro ao salvar algumas faltas: #{errors.join('; ')}"
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                    return
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                  end
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

            
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                  # Mensagem mais informativa
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                  present_count = @students.count - success_count
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                  if absent_student_ids.empty?
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                    message = "Chamada registrada! Todos os #{@students.count} alunos marcados como presentes."
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                  else
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                    message = "Chamada registrada! #{present_count} presente(s), #{success_count} ausente(s)."
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                    message += " (#{deleted_count} registro(s) anterior(es) removido(s))" if deleted_count > 0
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                  end
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                  
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                  redirect_to attendance_teachers_absences_path(
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                    subject_name: subject_name,
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                    classroom_id: @selected_classroom.id,
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                    date: @date
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                  ), notice: message
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "=== EXCEPTION IN BULK CREATE ==="
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Error: #{e.class.name} - #{e.message}"
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error e.backtrace.join("\n")
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                  redirect_to attendance_teachers_absences_path, alert: "Erro ao processar a chamada: #{e.message}"
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                end
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

              end
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

            
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

              def show
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

              end
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

            
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

              def new
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                @absence = Absence.new
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                @subjects = current_user.teacher_subjects.includes(:classroom)
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                @subject = params[:subject_id] ? current_user.teacher_subjects.find(params[:subject_id]) : nil
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                @classrooms = @subject&.available_classrooms || []
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                @selected_classroom = params[:classroom_id] ? Classroom.find(params[:classroom_id]) : nil
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                @students = @selected_classroom ? @subject&.students_from_classroom(@selected_classroom.id) || [] : []
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

            
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                # Preservar dados do form se houver erro de validao
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                if params[:absence]
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                  @absence.assign_attributes(absence_params)
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                  # Recuperar classroom_id dos parmetros se disponvel
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                  @selected_classroom = params[:absence][:classroom_id].present? ? Classroom.find(params[:absence][:classroom_id]) : @selected_classroom
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                  @students = @selected_classroom ? @subject&.students_from_classroom(@selected_classroom.id) || [] : @students
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                end
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

              end
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

            
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

              def edit
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                @subjects = current_user.teacher_subjects
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                @students = @absence.subject.students
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

              end
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

            
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

              def create
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                @absence = Absence.new(absence_params)
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

            
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                if @absence.save
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                  redirect_to teachers_absences_path(subject_id: @absence.subject_id), notice: "Falta registrada com sucesso."
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                else
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                  @subjects = current_user.teacher_subjects.includes(:classroom)
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                  @subject = Subject.find(absence_params[:subject_id]) if absence_params[:subject_id]
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                  @classrooms = @subject&.available_classrooms || []
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                  # Obter classroom_id dos parmetros da requisio, no do model absence
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                  @selected_classroom = params[:absence][:classroom_id].present? ? Classroom.find(params[:absence][:classroom_id]) : nil
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

                  @students = @selected_classroom ? @subject&.students_from_classroom(@selected_classroom.id) || [] : []
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

                  render :new
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

                end
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

              end
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

            
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

              def update
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

                if @absence.update(absence_params)
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

                  redirect_to teachers_absences_path(subject_id: @absence.subject_id), notice: "Falta atualizada com sucesso."
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

                else
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

                  @subjects = current_user.teacher_subjects
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

                  @students = @absence.subject.students
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

                  render :edit
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

                end
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

              end
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

            
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

              def destroy
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

                subject_id = @absence.subject_id
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

                @absence.destroy
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

                redirect_to teachers_absences_path(subject_id: subject_id), notice: "Falta removida com sucesso."
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

              end

              def load_attendance_data
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            

                # Inicializar variveis vazias
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            

                @classrooms = []
