    252. 
            

            

                @students = []
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            

                @subject_instances = []
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            

                @current_subject = nil
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            

                @selected_classroom = nil
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            

            
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            

                # Carregar turmas se disciplina foi selecionada
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            

                if @selected_subject_name.present?
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            

                  all_subjects = current_user.teacher_subjects.includes(:classroom)
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            

                  @subject_instances = all_subjects.select { |s| s.name == @selected_subject_name }
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            

                  @classrooms = @subject_instances.map(&:available_classrooms).flatten.uniq
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            

            
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            

                  # Carregar alunos se turma foi selecionada
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            

                  if @selected_classroom_id.present? && @classrooms.any? { |c| c.id.to_s == @selected_classroom_id.to_s }
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            

                    @selected_classroom = @classrooms.find { |c| c.id.to_s == @selected_classroom_id.to_s }
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            

                    @current_subject = @subject_instances.find { |s| s.available_classrooms.include?(@selected_classroom) }
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            

                    @students = @current_subject&.students_from_classroom(@selected_classroom_id) || []
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            

                  end
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            

                end
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            

            

              end
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            

            

            
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            

            

              def set_absence
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            

            

                @absence = Absence.joins(:subject).where(subjects: { user_id: current_user.id }).find(params[:id])
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            

            

              end
          
      275.

              def index
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                # Definir o ms e ano atual ou baseado nos parmetros
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                @current_date = params[:date] ? Date.parse(params[:date]) : Date.current

    45. 
            

            

                # Calcular navegao do calendrio

                @prev_month = @current_month - 1.month

              def build_calendar_query(month_start, month_end)
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                calendars = Calendar.includes(:school).where(date: month_start..month_end)
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

            
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                if current_user.school_id.present?
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                  calendars.where(
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                    "(all_schools = ? OR school_id = ?)",
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                    true, current_user.school_id
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                  )
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                else
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                  # Professor sem escola v apenas eventos municipais
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                  calendars.where(all_schools: true)
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                end
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

              end
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

            
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

              def build_events_query(month_start, month_end)
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                events = Event.includes(:school).where(
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                  "COALESCE(start_date, event_date) >= ? AND COALESCE(start_date, event_date) <= ?",
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                  month_start, month_end
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                )
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

            
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                if current_user.school_id.present?
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                  events.where(
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                    "(is_municipal = ? OR school_id = ?)",
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                    true, current_user.school_id
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                  )
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                else
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                  # Professor sem escola v apenas eventos municipais
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                  events.where(is_municipal: true)
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                end
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

              end

    90. 
            

            

            end

              def index

    7. 
            

            

                @schedules_by_subject = {}

            class Teachers::DashboardController < ApplicationController
          
      2.

              before_action :authenticate_user!

              before_action :ensure_teacher!

    5. 
            

            

              def index
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                @teacher = current_user
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                @subjects = @teacher.teacher_subjects.includes(:classroom, :school, class_schedules: :classroom)

    8. 
            

            

                @recent_messages = @teacher.received_messages.unread.recent.limit(5)

                # Additional instance variables needed by the view
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                @my_classrooms = @teacher.my_classrooms
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                @my_subjects = @teacher.my_subjects
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                @today_schedule = @classes_today
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                @average_grade = calculate_average_grade
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                @attendance_rate = calculate_attendance_rate
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

            
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                # Missing variables that the view expects
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

              end
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

            
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

              private
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

            
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

            
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

              def total_students_count
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                classroom_ids = @teacher.teacher_classrooms.pluck(:id)
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                User.where(classroom_id: classroom_ids, user_type: "student").count
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

              end
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

            
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

              def classes_today
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                today_weekday = Date.current.wday
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                @teacher.class_schedules
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                        .where(weekday: today_weekday)
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                        .includes(:classroom, :subject)
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

              end
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

            
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

              def calculate_average_grade
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                # Calculate average grade across all teacher's subjects
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                grades = Grade.joins(:subject).where(subjects: { user_id: @teacher.id })
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                return nil if grades.empty?
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                grades.average(:value)&.round(2)
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

              end
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

            
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

              def calculate_attendance_rate
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                # Calculate attendance rate across all teacher's students
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                classroom_ids = @teacher.teacher_classrooms.pluck(:id)
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                total_students = User.where(classroom_id: classroom_ids, user_type: "student").count
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                return nil if total_students.zero?
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

            
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                total_absences = Absence.joins(:subject).where(subjects: { user_id: @teacher.id }).count
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                total_possible_classes = total_students * @teacher.teacher_subjects.count * 30 # Assume 30 classes per subject per month
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                return nil if total_possible_classes.zero?
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

            
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                ((total_possible_classes - total_absences).to_f / total_possible_classes * 100).round(2)
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

              end
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

            end
          
      57.

    app/controllers/teachers/documents_controller.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    142 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 142 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            class Teachers::DocumentsController < ApplicationController

              before_action :authenticate_user!

              before_action :ensure_teacher!
          
      4.

              before_action :set_document, only: [ :show, :edit, :update, :destroy, :download ]

              def index
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                # Get all documents from the teacher's school that they can view
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                @documents = Document.where(school: current_user.school)
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                                    .includes(:user, :subject, :recipient)
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                                    .select { |doc| doc.can_be_viewed_by?(current_user) }
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                                    .sort_by(&:created_at)
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                                    .reverse
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

            
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                @my_documents = current_user.teacher_documents
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                                           .where(school: current_user.school)
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                                           .includes(:subject, :recipient)
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                                           .order(created_at: :desc)
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

            
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                # Documentos anexados para meus alunos
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                my_student_ids = available_students.pluck(:id)
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                @documents_for_students = Document.where(
          
      22.

                  school: current_user.school,

                  recipient_type: "User",

              def new
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                @document = current_user.authored_documents.build
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                @subjects = grouped_subjects_for_select
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                @students = available_students
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                @classrooms = available_classrooms
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

            
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                # Debug: verificar se h alunos disponveis
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "=== DEBUG: Alunos disponveis para #{current_user.full_name}: #{@students.count} ==="
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                # Para anexar documentos para alunos especficos
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                @target_student = User.find(params[:student_id]) if params[:student_id].present?

    42. 
            

            

                if @target_student && !@target_student.student?

                  @target_student = nil

              def create
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                @document = current_user.authored_documents.build(document_params)
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                @document.school = current_user.school
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                @document.attached_by = current_user
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

            
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                # Se for anexo para aluno especfico
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                if params[:document][:target_student_id].present?
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                  target_student = User.find(params[:document][:target_student_id])
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  if @document.can_be_attached_by?(current_user, target_student)
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                    @document.sharing_type = "specific_user"
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                    @document.recipient = target_student
          
      64.

                  else

                    @document.errors.add(:base, "Voc no tem permisso para anexar documentos para este aluno.")

                  end
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                end
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

            
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                if @document.save

                  redirect_to teachers_document_path(@document), notice: "Documento criado com sucesso."
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                else
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                  @subjects = grouped_subjects_for_select
          
      73.

                  @students = available_students

              def destroy

      94.

              def attach_to_student
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                @student = User.find(params[:student_id])
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                unless @student.student? && available_students.include?(@student)
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                  redirect_to teachers_documents_path, alert: "Aluno no encontrado ou no pertence s suas turmas."
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                  return
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                end
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

            
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                @document = current_user.authored_documents.build
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                @document.recipient = @student
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                @document.sharing_type = "specific_user"
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

            
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                render :new

    107.

      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

            
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

              def download
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                if @document.attachment.attached?
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                  # Active Storage attachment - redirect to rails blob path
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                  redirect_to rails_blob_path(@document.attachment, disposition: "attachment")
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                elsif @document.file_path.present? && File.exist?(@document.file_path)
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                  # Legacy file_path system
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                  safe_filename = File.basename(@document.file_name || "document")
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                  send_file @document.file_path,
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                            disposition: "attachment",
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                            filename: safe_filename
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                else
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                  redirect_to teachers_documents_path, alert: "Arquivo no encontrado."
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                end
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

              end
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

            
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

              private
          
      125.

      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

              def set_document
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                # Buscar documento que:
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                # 1. Foi criado pelo professor atual OU
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                # 2. Pertence a uma disciplina do professor OU
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                # 3. Foi compartilhado com a escola (criado por direction/admin da mesma escola)
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                @document = Document.left_joins(:subject, :user)
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                                   .where(
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                                     'documents.user_id = ? OR
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                                      (subjects.user_id = ? AND documents.subject_id IS NOT NULL) OR
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                                      (documents.school_id = ? AND users.user_type IN (?))',
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                                     current_user.id,
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                                     current_user.id,
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                                     current_user.school_id,
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                                     [ "direction", "admin" ]
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                                   )
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                                   .find(params[:id])
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

              rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                redirect_to teachers_documents_path, alert: "Documento no encontrado ou voc no tem permisso para acess-lo."
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

              end
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

            
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

              def available_students
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                # Buscar turmas do professor atravs de suas disciplinas
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                classroom_ids = current_user.subjects.pluck(:classroom_id).compact.uniq
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                # Se no h turmas com disciplinas, buscar todos os alunos da escola do professor
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                if classroom_ids.empty?
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                  # Buscar alunos da mesma escola
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                  User.where(school: current_user.school, user_type: "student")
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                      .order(:first_name, :last_name)
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                else
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                  # Buscar alunos das turmas onde o professor leciona
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                  User.where(classroom_id: classroom_ids, user_type: "student")
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                      .order(:first_name, :last_name)
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                end
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

              end
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

            
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

              def available_classrooms
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                current_user.teacher_classrooms.distinct
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

              end
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

            
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

              def grouped_subjects_for_select
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                # Agrupar disciplinas por nome e mostrar apenas uma vez cada disciplina
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                subject_groups = current_user.teacher_subjects
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                                            .includes(:classroom)
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                                            .group_by(&:name)
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

            
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                subject_options = []
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

            
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                subject_groups.each do |subject_name, subjects|
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                  # Pegar o primeiro subject do grupo para usar como representante
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                  representative_subject = subjects.first
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                  subject_options << [ subject_name, representative_subject.id ]
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                end
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

            
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                subject_options.sort_by(&:first)
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

              end
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

            
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

              def document_params
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                params.require(:document).permit(:title, :description, :subject_id, :user_id, :attachment, :document_type, :sharing_type, :classroom_id, :target_student_id)

    185. 
            

            

              end
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

            end

              def index

                # Verificar se o usurio tem escola associada
          
      7.

                unless current_user.school

      11.

                @events = current_user.school.events

    13. 
            

            

            
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                # Aplicar filtros baseados nos parmetros
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                if params[:period].present?
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  case params[:period]
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  when "week"
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                    @events = @events.where(start_date: Date.current..Date.current + 7.days)
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  when "month"
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                    @events = @events.where(start_date: Date.current..Date.current + 30.days)
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  when "current_month"
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                    @events = @events.where(start_date: Date.current.beginning_of_month..Date.current.end_of_month)
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  when "past"
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                    @events = @events.where("end_date < ?", Date.current)
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  else
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                    # 'all' ou sem filtro - mostrar futuros por padro
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                    @events = @events.where("start_date >= ?", Date.current) unless params[:period] == "all"

    28.

      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29.

      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  # Por padro, mostrar apenas eventos futuros
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  @events = @events.where("start_date >= ?", Date.current)
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                end
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

            
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                # Filtro por tipo (mapear de ingls para portugus)

    37.

    39.

    43.

      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44.

      46.

                # Filtro por busca

                # Ordenar por data

              def index
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                @subjects = current_user.teacher_subjects.includes(:classroom)

      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                # Obter turmas disponveis para o professor atravs de class_schedules

    11.

              def new

    42. 
            

            

                @grade = Grade.new(

      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

            
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                # Agrupar disciplinas por nome para o seletor inicial

              def edit
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                @subjects = current_user.teacher_subjects

              def get_classrooms
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                subject_name = params[:subject_name]
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

            
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                if subject_name.present?
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                  subject_instances = current_user.teacher_subjects.select { |s| s.name == subject_name }
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                  classrooms = subject_instances.map(&:available_classrooms).flatten.uniq
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

            
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                  render json: {
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                    classrooms: classrooms.map { |c| { id: c.id, name: c.name } }
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                  }
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                else
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                  render json: { classrooms: [] }
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                end
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

              end
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

            
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

              def get_students

                subject_name = params[:subject_name]
          
      95.

                classroom_id = params[:classroom_id]
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

            
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                if subject_name.present? && classroom_id.present?
          
      98.

      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99.

      100.

                  subject = subject_instances.find { |s| s.available_classrooms.include?(classroom) }
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

            
          
      102.

                  if subject

                @selected_subject_name = subject_name

      175.

              def update

              def destroy

              def set_grade
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                @grade = Grade.joins(:subject).where(subjects: { user_id: current_user.id }).find(params[:id])

    203. 
            

            

              end
          
      204.

              def load_form_data
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                # Inicializar variveis vazias
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                @classrooms = []
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                @students = []
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                @subject_instances = []
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                @current_subject = nil
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                @selected_classroom = nil
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

            
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                # Carregar turmas se disciplina foi selecionada
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                if @selected_subject_name.present?
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                  all_subjects = current_user.teacher_subjects.includes(:classroom)
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                  @subject_instances = all_subjects.select { |s| s.name == @selected_subject_name }
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                  @classrooms = @subject_instances.map(&:available_classrooms).flatten.uniq
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

            
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                  # Carregar alunos se turma foi selecionada
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                  if @selected_classroom_id.present? && @classrooms.any? { |c| c.id.to_s == @selected_classroom_id.to_s }
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                    @selected_classroom = @classrooms.find { |c| c.id.to_s == @selected_classroom_id.to_s }
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                    @current_subject = @subject_instances.find { |s| s.available_classrooms.include?(@selected_classroom) }
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                    @students = @current_subject&.students_from_classroom(@selected_classroom_id) || []
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                  end
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                end
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

              end
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

            
          
      228.

              def grade_params
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

                params.require(:grade).permit(:subject_id, :subject_name, :classroom_id, :user_id, :bimester, :value, :max_value, :assessment_name, :assessment_date, :grade_type)
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

              end
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

            end

    0.0% lines covered

            class Teachers::MessagesController < ApplicationController
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              before_action :authenticate_user!
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              before_action :ensure_teacher!
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              before_action :set_message, only: [ :show ]
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

            
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              def index
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                # Aplicar filtros
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                sent_messages = current_user.sent_messages.where(school: current_user.school)
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                received_messages = current_user.received_messages.where(school: current_user.school)
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

            
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                # Filtro por status
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                if params[:status].present?
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  case params[:status]
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  when "unread"
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                    sent_messages = sent_messages.where(read: false)
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                    received_messages = received_messages.unread
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  when "read"
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                    sent_messages = sent_messages.where(read: true)
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                    received_messages = received_messages.where(read_at: nil..)
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  end
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                end
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

            
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                # Filtro por tipo
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                if params[:type].present?
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  case params[:type]
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                  when "received"
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                    sent_messages = sent_messages.none
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  when "sent"
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                    received_messages = received_messages.none
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  end
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                end
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

            
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                # Filtro de busca
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                if params[:search].present?
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  search_term = "%#{params[:search]}%"
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  sent_messages = sent_messages.joins(:recipient)
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                                              .where("messages.subject ILIKE ? OR messages.body ILIKE ? OR users.full_name ILIKE ?",
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                                                     search_term, search_term, search_term)
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  received_messages = received_messages.joins(:sender)
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                                                      .where("messages.subject ILIKE ? OR messages.body ILIKE ? OR users.full_name ILIKE ?",
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                                                             search_term, search_term, search_term)
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                end
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

            
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                @sent_messages = sent_messages.order(created_at: :desc).limit(50)
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                @received_messages = received_messages.order(created_at: :desc).limit(50)
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

              end
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

            
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

              def show
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                @message.mark_as_read! unless @message.read?
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

              end
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

            
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

              def new
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                @message = current_user.sent_messages.build
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                @recipient_service = MessageRecipientService.new(current_user)
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

              end
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

            
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

              def create
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                @message = current_user.sent_messages.build(message_params)
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                @message.school = current_user.school
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

            
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                if @message.save
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                  redirect_to teachers_messages_path, notice: "Mensagem enviada com sucesso."
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                else
          
      64.

                  @recipient_service = MessageRecipientService.new(current_user)

              def create_message_to_user(recipient, content, subject)

    136. 
            

            

                current_user.sent_messages.create(

    141.

              def available_classrooms
