              def calculate_student_performance(students, subject)
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                students.map do |student|
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                  grades = student.grades.where(subject: subject)
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                  absences = student.absences.where(subject: subject)
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

            
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                  {
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                    student: student,
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                    average_grade: grades.average(:value) || 0,
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                    total_grades: grades.count,
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                    total_absences: absences.count,
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                    attendance_rate: calculate_attendance_rate(student, subject)
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                  }
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                end
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

              end
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

            
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

              def calculate_classroom_performance(students, subjects)
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                subjects.map do |subject|
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                  subject_students = students.where(classroom: subject.classroom)
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

            
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                  grades = Grade.where(subject: subject, student: subject_students)
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

            
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                  {
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                    subject: subject,
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                    average_grade: grades.average(:value) || 0,
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                    students_count: subject_students.count,
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                    grades_count: grades.count
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                  }
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                end
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

              end
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

            
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

              def calculate_subject_attendance(subject, start_date, end_date)
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                students = subject.students
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                absences = Absence.where(
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                  subject: subject,
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                  student: students,
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                  date: start_date..end_date
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                )
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

            
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                students.map do |student|
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                  student_absences = absences.where(student: student).count
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                  total_classes = calculate_total_classes(subject, start_date, end_date)
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                  attendance_rate = total_classes > 0 ? ((total_classes - student_absences) * 100.0 / total_classes) : 100
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

            
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                  {
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                    student: student,
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                    absences: student_absences,
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                    total_classes: total_classes,
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                    attendance_rate: attendance_rate.round(1)
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                  }
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                end
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

              end
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

            
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

              def calculate_classroom_attendance(classroom, subjects, start_date, end_date)
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                classroom.students.map do |student|
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                  total_absences = 0
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                  total_classes = 0
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

            
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                  subjects.each do |subject|
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                    absences = Absence.where(
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                      subject: subject,
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                      student: student,
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                      date: start_date..end_date
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                    ).count
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

            
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                    classes = calculate_total_classes(subject, start_date, end_date)
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

            
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                    total_absences += absences
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                    total_classes += classes
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                  end
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

            
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                  attendance_rate = total_classes > 0 ? ((total_classes - total_absences) * 100.0 / total_classes) : 100
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

            
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                  {
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                    student: student,
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                    absences: total_absences,
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                    total_classes: total_classes,
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                    attendance_rate: attendance_rate.round(1)
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                  }
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                end
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

              end
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

            
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

              def calculate_subject_grades(subject)
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                grades = Grade.where(subject: subject).includes(:student)
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

            
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                {
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                  subject: subject,
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                  total_grades: grades.count,
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                  average_grade: grades.average(:value) || 0,
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                  highest_grade: grades.maximum(:value) || 0,
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                  lowest_grade: grades.minimum(:value) || 0,
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                  students_with_grades: grades.distinct.count(:student_id)
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                }
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

              end
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

            
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

              def calculate_classroom_grades(classroom, subjects)
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                subjects.map do |subject|
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                  calculate_subject_grades(subject)
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                end
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

              end
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

            
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

              def calculate_attendance_rate(student, subject)
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                # Lgica simplificada - pode ser melhorada
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                total_classes = 40 # Aproximao baseada no semestre
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                absences = student.absences.where(subject: subject).count
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                ((total_classes - absences) * 100.0 / total_classes).round(1)
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

              end
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

            
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

              def calculate_total_classes(subject, start_date, end_date)
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                # Lgica simplificada - contar aulas baseado na grade horria
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                # Pode ser melhorada com um sistema mais preciso de controle de aulas
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                weeks = ((end_date - start_date) / 7).ceil
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                classes_per_week = subject.class_schedules.count
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                weeks * classes_per_week
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

              end
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

            
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

              def render_pdf(template_name)
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                # Implementao de gerao de PDF seria aqui
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                # Por enquanto, redireciona para HTML
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                redirect_to teachers_reports_path, notice: "Visualizao em PDF em desenvolvimento."
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

              end
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

            end
          
      200.

              def calculate_average(student, subject = nil)
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

                grades = subject ? student.grades.where(subject: subject) : student.grades
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

                return nil if grades.empty?
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

            
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                total = grades.sum(:value)

                total.to_f / grades.count

              def event_status_color(event)
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                if event.end_date && event.end_date < Date.current
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  "secondary"  # Evento passado
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                elsif event.start_date == Date.current
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  "success"    # Evento hoje
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                elsif event.start_date > Date.current
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  "primary"    # Evento futuro
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                else
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41.

              def recipient_options_grouped(current_user)

              def format_user_display_name(user)
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                case user.user_type
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                when "direction"
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  "#{user.full_name} (Direo)"
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                when "teacher"
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  "#{user.full_name} (Professor)"
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                when "student"
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  # Como as classrooms j esto pr-carregadas, podemos acessar diretamente
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  classroom_info = user.classroom&.name ? " - #{user.classroom.name}" : ""
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  "#{user.full_name} (Aluno#{classroom_info})"
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                else

              def weekday_name

              def average_attendance_rate
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                return 0 if students.empty?
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

            
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                total_classes = subjects.sum(:workload)
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                return 0 if total_classes.zero?
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

            
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                total_absences = absences.count
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                total_possible_attendances = students.count * total_classes
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

            
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                return 0 if total_possible_attendances.zero?
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

            
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                ((total_possible_attendances - total_absences).to_f / total_possible_attendances * 100).round(2)
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

              end

    69.

              def type_description

              def sharing_description
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                case sharing_type
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                when "all_students" then "Todos os alunos da escola"
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                when "specific_student" then user_id.present? ? "Aluno especfico" : "No definido"
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                when "specific_classroom" then classroom.present? ? "Turma: #{classroom.name}" : "Turma no definida"

    89.

              def shared_with_student?(student)
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                # Se for documento especfico para um usurio
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                if sharing_type == "specific_user"

    98.

      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                end
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

            
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                case sharing_type
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                when "all_students" then true
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                when "specific_student" then user_id == student.id
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                when "specific_classroom" then classroom_id == student.classroom_id
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                when "all_subject_students" then subject.present? && subject.classroom_id == student.classroom_id
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                else false
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107.

              def can_be_viewed_by?(user)

                return false unless user

      114.

      119.

      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

            
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                # Se  professor, pode ver documentos de alunos de suas turmas
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                if user.teacher?
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                  if recipient_type == "User" && recipient&.student?
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131.

      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134.

      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

            
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136.

    138.

      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                    return true # Professor pode ver documentos gerais da escola
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                  end
          
      141.

      142.

    144. 
            

            

                if user.student?
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                  return shared_with_student?(user)
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                end
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

            
          
      148.

                false

              def can_be_attached_by?(attacher, target_user)
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                return false unless attacher && target_user
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                return false unless attacher.school_id == target_user.school_id
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

            
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                case attacher.user_type
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                when "direction"
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                  # Diretor pode anexar documentos para qualquer um da escola
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                  target_user.teacher? || target_user.student?
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                when "teacher"
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                  # Professor pode anexar documentos apenas para alunos de suas turmas
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                  if target_user.student?
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                    teacher_classroom_ids = attacher.teacher_subjects.pluck(:classroom_id).uniq
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                    teacher_classroom_ids.include?(target_user.classroom_id)
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                  else
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                    false
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                  end
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                when "student"
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                  # Aluno s pode anexar documentos para si mesmo
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                  attacher.id == target_user.id
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                else
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                  false
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                end
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

              end
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

            
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            
              1
            

            

              def attachment_hierarchy_level
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                return "admin" if user&.admin?
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                return "direction" if user&.direction?
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                return "teacher" if user&.teacher?
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                return "student" if user&.student?
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                "unknown"
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181.

      182.

              1
            

            

              private
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

            
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            
              1
            

            

              def number_to_human_size(size)
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                units = %w[B KB MB GB TB]
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                unit = 0
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                while size >= 1024 && unit < units.length - 1
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                  size /= 1024.0
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                  unit += 1
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                end
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                "#{size.round(1)} #{units[unit]}"
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

              end
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

            end
          
      195.

    app/models/event.rb

    52.44% lines covered

    82 relevant lines. 43 lines covered and 39 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            
              1
            

            

            class Event < ApplicationRecord
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            
              1
            

            

              belongs_to :school, optional: true
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

            
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            
              1
            

            

              validates :title, presence: true
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            
              1
            

            

              validates_presence_of :start_date, unless: :event_date
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            
              1
            

            

              validates_presence_of :event_date, unless: :start_date
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            
              1
            

            

              validates :event_type, inclusion: { in: %w[academico cultural esportivo administrativo reuniao feriado general meeting holiday academic celebration training other] }, allow_blank: true
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8.

              validate :end_date_after_start_date

              scope :upcoming, -> { where("COALESCE(start_date, event_date) >= ?", Date.current) }

              scope :by_type, ->(type) { where(event_type: type) }

              def municipal?
          
      22.

                is_municipal == true

              def upcoming?
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            
              4
            

            

                date = start_date || event_date
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            
              4
            

            

                return false if date.nil?
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            
              3

              def admin_recipients_grouped

      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                school_users = current_user.school.users.where.not(id: current_user.id).includes(:classroom)
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

            
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                {
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                  "Diretores" => school_users.directions.to_a,
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                  "Professores" => school_users.teachers.to_a,
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                  "Alunos" => school_users.students.to_a
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                }
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

              end
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

            
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            
              1
            

            

              def teacher_recipients_grouped
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                # Direo da escola
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                direction_users = current_user.school.directions.includes(:school).to_a
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

            
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                # Alunos das turmas do professor atravs dos horrios
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                # Usar teacher_classrooms que j considera os class_schedules
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                classroom_ids = current_user.teacher_classrooms.pluck(:id).uniq
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                student_users = User.where(classroom_id: classroom_ids, user_type: "student").includes(:classroom, :school).to_a
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

            
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                # Outros professores da escola
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128.

      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

            
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                recipients = {}
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                recipients["Direo"] = direction_users unless direction_users.empty?
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                recipients["Professores"] = teacher_users unless teacher_users.empty?
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                recipients["Alunos"] = student_users unless student_users.empty?
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

            
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                recipients
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

              end
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137.

              1
            

            

              def student_recipients_grouped
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                return {} unless current_user.classroom
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

            
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                # Professores das matrias do aluno (via class_schedules)
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                # Buscar disciplinas que tm horrios na turma do aluno
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                teacher_ids = Subject.joins(:class_schedules)
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                                     .where(class_schedules: { classroom: current_user.classroom })
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                                     .where.not(user_id: nil)
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                                     .pluck(:user_id)
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                                     .uniq
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

            
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                # Adicionar tambm professores das disciplinas diretas da turma
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                direct_teacher_ids = current_user.classroom.subjects.where.not(user_id: nil).pluck(:user_id)
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                teacher_ids = (teacher_ids + direct_teacher_ids).uniq
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

            
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                teacher_users = User.where(id: teacher_ids).includes(:school).to_a
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

            
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                # Direo da escola
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                direction_users = current_user.school.directions.includes(:school).to_a
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

            
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                recipients = {}
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                recipients["Direo"] = direction_users unless direction_users.empty?
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                recipients["Professores"] = teacher_users unless teacher_users.empty?
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

            
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                recipients
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

              end
          
      164.

            class NotificationService
          
      2.

              def self.create_system_announcement(title, content, target_users = nil)
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

                target_users ||= User.all
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

            
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                target_users.find_each do |user|
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                  Notification.create!(
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                    user: user,
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                    sender: User.admins.first,
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                    title: title,
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                    content: content,
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                    notification_type: "system_announcement"
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  )
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                end
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

              end
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

            
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

              def self.notify_new_event(event)
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                case event.scope
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                when "municipal"
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  # Notificar todos os usurios
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  target_users = User.all
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                when "school"
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  # Notificar apenas usurios da escola
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  target_users = event.school.users
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                else
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  target_users = User.none
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                end
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

            
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                target_users.find_each do |user|
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  Notification.create!(
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                    user: user,
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                    sender: event.school&.directions&.first || User.admins.first,
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                    school: event.school,
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                    title: "Novo evento: #{event.title}",
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                    content: "#{event.description}\nData: #{event.start_date&.strftime('%d/%m/%Y')}",
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                    notification_type: "school_event",
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                    metadata: { event_id: event.id }
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  )
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                end
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

              end
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

            
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

              def self.notify_grade_posted(grade)
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                Notification.create!(
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  user: grade.student,
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  sender: grade.subject.teacher,
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  school: grade.student.school,
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  title: "Nova nota em #{grade.subject.name}",
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                  content: "Sua nota foi lanada: #{grade.value}\nData: #{grade.created_at.strftime('%d/%m/%Y')}",
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                  notification_type: "grade_posted",
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                  metadata: {
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                    grade_id: grade.id,
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                    subject_id: grade.subject.id,
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                    grade_value: grade.value
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  }
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                )
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

              end
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

            
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

              def self.notify_document_available(document, recipients)
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                recipients.find_each do |user|
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  Notification.create!(
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                    user: user,
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                    sender: document.uploader || User.admins.first,
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                    school: document.school,
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                    title: "Novo documento disponvel",
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                    content: "Um novo documento foi disponibilizado: #{document.title}\nTipo: #{document.document_type}",
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                    notification_type: "document_available",
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                    metadata: { document_id: document.id }
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                  )
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                end
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

              end
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

            
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

              def self.notify_attendance_alert(student, absences_count)
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                # Notificar quando aluno tem muitas faltas
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                threshold = 10 # nmero de faltas para alertar
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

            
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                if absences_count >= threshold
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                  Notification.create!(
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                    user: student,
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                    sender: student.school.directions.first || User.admins.first,
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                    school: student.school,
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                    title: "Alerta de frequncia",
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                    content: "Voc possui #{absences_count} faltas registradas. Ateno para no ultrapassar o limite permitido.",
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                    notification_type: "attendance_alert",
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                    metadata: { absences_count: absences_count }
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                  )
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

            
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                  # Notificar tambm a direo
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                  student.school.directions.each do |director|
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                    Notification.create!(
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                      user: director,
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                      sender: User.admins.first,
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                      school: student.school,
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                      title: "Alerta de frequncia - #{student.full_name}",
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                      content: "O aluno #{student.full_name} possui #{absences_count} faltas registradas.",
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                      notification_type: "attendance_alert",
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                      metadata: { student_id: student.id, absences_count: absences_count }
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                    )
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                  end
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                end
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

              end
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

            
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

              def self.notify_message_received(message)
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                Notification.create!(
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                  user: message.recipient,
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                  sender: message.sender,
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                  school: message.school,
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                  title: "Nova mensagem recebida",
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                  content: "Voc recebeu uma nova mensagem de #{message.sender.full_name}\nAssunto: #{message.subject}",
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                  notification_type: "message_received",
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                  metadata: { message_id: message.id }
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                )
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

              end
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

            
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

              def self.notify_calendar_update(calendar_event, users)
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                users.find_each do |user|
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                  Notification.create!(
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                    user: user,
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                    sender: User.admins.first,
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                    title: "Atualizao no calendrio",
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                    content: "O calendrio acadmico foi atualizado. Verifique as novas datas e eventos.",
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                    notification_type: "calendar_update",
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                    metadata: { calendar_event_id: calendar_event&.id }
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                  )
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                end
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

              end
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

            
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

              def self.notify_system_maintenance(title, content, scheduled_time = nil)
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                User.all.find_each do |user|
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                  Notification.create!(
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                    user: user,
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                    sender: User.admins.first,
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                    title: title,
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                    content: content,
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                    notification_type: "system_maintenance",
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                    metadata: { scheduled_time: scheduled_time }
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                  )
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                end
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

              end
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

            end
          
      139.
